03202                 size_t read_size = fread(contents, 1, size, file); 
03203                 fclose(file); 
03204  
03205                 if (read_size != size) 
03206                 { 
03207                         global_deallocate(contents); 
03208                         return make_ParseResult(StatusIOError); 
03209                 } 
03210                  
03211                 return doc.LoadBufferInplaceOwn(contents, size, options, DocumentEncoding); 
03212         } 
03213  
03214 #ifndef XML_NO_STL 
03215         template <typename T> ParseResult LoadStreamImpl(Document& doc, std::basic_istream<T>& stream, unsigned int options, Encoding DocumentEncoding) 
03216         { 
03217                 // get length of remaining data in stream 
03218                 typename std::basic_istream<T>::pos_type pos = stream.tellg(); 
03219                 stream.seekg(0, std::ios::end); 
03220                 std::streamoff length = stream.tellg() - pos; 
03221                 stream.seekg(pos); 
03222  
03223                 if (stream.fail() || pos < 0) return make_ParseResult(StatusIOError); 
03224  
03225                 // guard against huge files 
03226                 size_t read_length = static_cast<size_t>(length); 
03227  
03228                 if (static_cast<std::streamsize>(read_length) != length || length < 0) return make_ParseResult(StatusOutOfMemory); 
03229  
03230                 // read stream data into memory (guard against stream exceptions with buffer holder) 
03231                 buffer_holder buffer(global_allocate((read_length > 0 ? read_length : 1) * sizeof(T)), global_deallocate); 
03232                 if (!buffer.data) return make_ParseResult(StatusOutOfMemory); 
03233  
03234                 stream.read(static_cast<T*>(buffer.data), static_cast<std::streamsize>(read_length)); 
03235  
03236                 // read may set failbit | eofbit in case gcount() is less than read_length (i.e. line ending conversion), so check for other I/O errors 
03237                 if (stream.bad()) return make_ParseResult(StatusIOError); 
03238  
03239                 // Load data from buffer 
03240                 size_t actual_length = static_cast<size_t>(stream.gcount()); 
03241                 assert(actual_length <= read_length); 
03242  
03243                 return doc.LoadBufferInplaceOwn(buffer.release(), actual_length * sizeof(T), options, DocumentEncoding); 
03244         } 
03245 #endif 
03246  
03247 #if defined(_MSC_VER) || defined(__BORLANDC__) || defined(__MINGW32__) 
03248         FILE* open_file_wide(const wchar_t* Path, const wchar_t* mode) 
03249         { 
03250                 return _wfopen(Path, mode); 
03251         } 
03252 #else 
03253         char* convert_Path_heap(const wchar_t* str) 
03254         { 
03255                 assert(str); 
03256  
03257                 // first pass: get length in utf8 characters 
03258                 size_t length = wcslen(str); 
03259                 size_t size = AsUtf8_begin(str, length); 
03260  
03261                 // allocate Resulting string 
03262                 char* Result = static_cast<char*>(global_allocate(size + 1)); 
03263                 if (!Result) return 0; 
03264  
03265                 // second pass: convert to utf8 
03266                 AsUtf8_end(Result, size, str, length); 
03267  
03268                 return Result; 
03269         } 
03270  
03271         FILE* open_file_wide(const wchar_t* Path, const wchar_t* mode) 
03272         { 
03273                 // there is no standard function to open wide Paths, so our best bet is to try utf8 Path 
03274                 char* Path_utf8 = convert_Path_heap(Path); 
03275                 if (!Path_utf8) return 0; 
03276  
03277                 // convert mode to ASCII (we mirror _wfopen interface) 
03278                 char mode_ascii[4] = {0}; 
03279                 for (size_t i = 0; mode[i]; ++i) mode_ascii[i] = static_cast<char>(mode[i]); 
03280  
03281                 // try to open the utf8 Path 
03282                 FILE* Result = fopen(Path_utf8, mode_ascii); 
03283  
03284                 // free dummy buffer 
03285                 global_deallocate(Path_utf8); 
03286  
03287                 return Result; 
03288         } 
03289 #endif 
03290 } 
03291  
03292 
03293 namespace phys
03294 { namespace xml
03295 { 
03296         WriterFile::WriterFile(void* file): file(file) 
03297         { 
03298         } 
03299  
03300         void WriterFile::Write(const void* data, size_t size) 
03301         { 
03302                 fwrite(data, size, 1, static_cast<FILE*>(file)); 
03303         } 
03304  
03305 #ifndef XML_NO_STL 
03306         WriterStream::WriterStream(std::basic_ostream<char, std::char_traits<char> >& stream): narrow_stream(&stream), wide_stream(0) 
03307         { 
03308         } 
03309  
03310         WriterStream::WriterStream(std::basic_ostream<wchar_t, std::char_traits<wchar_t> >& stream): narrow_stream(0), wide_stream(&stream) 
03311         { 
03312         } 
03313  
03314         void WriterStream::Write(const void* data, size_t size) 
03315         { 
03316                 if (narrow_stream) 
03317                 { 
03318                         assert(!wide_stream); 
03319                         narrow_stream->write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(data), static_cast<std::streamsize>(size)); 
03320                 } 
03321                 else 
03322                 { 
03323                         assert(wide_stream); 
03324                         assert(size % sizeof(wchar_t) == 0); 
03325  
03326                         wide_stream->write(reinterpret_cast<const wchar_t*>(data), static_cast<std::streamsize>(size / sizeof(wchar_t))); 
03327                 } 
03328         } 
03329 #endif 
03330  
03331         TreeWalker::TreeWalker(): _Depth(0) 
03332         { 
03333         } 
03334          
03335         TreeWalker::~TreeWalker() 
03336         { 
03337         } 
03338  
03339         int TreeWalker::Depth() const 
03340         { 
03341                 return _Depth; 
03342         } 
03343  
03344         bool TreeWalker::begin(Node&) 
03345         { 
03346                 return true; 
03347         } 
03348  
03349         bool TreeWalker::end(Node&) 
03350         { 
03351                 return true; 
03352         } 
03353  
03354         Attribute::Attribute(): _attr(0) 
03355         { 
03356         } 
03357  
03358         Attribute::Attribute(AttributeStruct* attr): _attr(attr) 
03359         { 
03360         } 
03361  
03362         Attribute::operator Attribute::unspecified_bool_type() const 
03363         { 
03364                 return _attr ? &Attribute::_attr : 0; 
03365         } 
03366  
03367         bool Attribute::operator!() const 
03368         { 
03369                 return !_attr; 
03370         } 
03371  
03372         bool Attribute::operator==(const Attribute& r) const 
03373         { 
03374                 return (_attr == r._attr); 
03375         } 
03376          
03377         bool Attribute::operator!=(const Attribute& r) const 
03378         { 
03379                 return (_attr != r._attr); 
03380         } 
03381  
03382         bool Attribute::operator<(const Attribute& r) const 
03383         { 
03384                 return (_attr < r._attr); 
03385         } 
03386          
03387         bool Attribute::operator>(const Attribute& r) const 
03388         { 
03389                 return (_attr > r._attr); 
03390         } 
03391          
03392         bool Attribute::operator<=(const Attribute& r) const 
03393         { 
03394                 return (_attr <= r._attr); 
03395         } 
03396          
03397         bool Attribute::operator>=(const Attribute& r) const 
03398         { 
03399                 return (_attr >= r._attr); 
03400         } 
03401  
03402         Attribute Attribute::GetNextAttribute() const 
03403         { 
03404                 return _attr ? Attribute(_attr->GetNextAttribute) : Attribute(); 
03405         } 
03406  
03407         Attribute Attribute::GetPreviousAttribute() const 
03408         { 
03409                 return _attr && _attr->prev_attribute_c->GetNextAttribute ? Attribute(_attr->prev_attribute_c) : Attribute(); 
03410         } 
03411  
03412         int Attribute::AsInt() const 
03413         { 
03414                 if (!_attr || !_attr->Value) return 0; 
03415  
03416         #ifdef XML_WCHAR_MODE 
03417                 return (int)wcstol(_attr->Value, 0, 10); 
03418         #else 
03419                 return (int)strtol(_attr->Value, 0, 10); 
03420         #endif 
03421         } 
03422  
03423         unsigned int Attribute::AsUint() const 
03424         { 
03425                 if (!_attr || !_attr->Value) return 0; 
03426  
03427         #ifdef XML_WCHAR_MODE 
03428                 return (unsigned int)wcstoul(_attr->Value, 0, 10); 
03429         #else 
03430                 return (unsigned int)strtoul(_attr->Value, 0, 10); 
03431         #endif 
03432         } 
03433  
03434         double Attribute::AsDouble() const 
03435         { 
03436                 if (!_attr || !_attr->Value) return 0; 
03437  
03438         #ifdef XML_WCHAR_MODE 
03439                 return wcstod(_attr->Value, 0); 
03440         #else 
03441                 return strtod(_attr->Value, 0); 
03442         #endif 
03443         } 
03444  
03445         Whole Attribute::AsWhole() const
03446         {
03447                 if (!_attr || !_attr->Value) return 0;
03448                 return ToWhole(_attr->Value);
03449         }
03450 
03451         Integer Attribute::AsInteger() const
03452         {
03453                 if (!_attr || !_attr->Value) return 0;
03454                 return ToInteger(_attr->Value);
03455         }
03456 
03457         String Attribute::AsString() const
03458         {
03459                 if (!_attr || !_attr->Value) return 0;
03460                 return ToString(_attr->Value);
03461         }
03462 
03463         Real Attribute::AsReal() const
03464         {
03465                 if (!_attr || !_attr->Value) return 0;
03466                 return ToReal(_attr->Value);
03467         }
03468 
03469         float Attribute::AsFloat() const 
03470         { 
03471                 if (!_attr || !_attr->Value) return 0; 
03472  
03473         #ifdef XML_WCHAR_MODE 
03474                 return (float)wcstod(_attr->Value, 0); 
03475         #else 
03476                 return (float)strtod(_attr->Value, 0); 
03477         #endif 
03478         } 
03479  
03480         bool Attribute::AsBool() const 
03481         { 
03482                 if (!_attr || !_attr->Value) return false; 
03483  
03484                 // only look at first char 
03485                 char_t first = *_attr->Value; 
03486  
03487                 // 1*, t* (true), T* (True), y* (yes), Y* (YES) 
03488                 return (first == '1' || first == 't' || first == 'T' || first == 'y' || first == 'Y'); 
03489         } 
03490  
03491         bool Attribute::Empty() const 
03492         { 
03493                 return !_attr; 
03494         } 
03495  
03496         const char_t* Attribute::Name() const 
03497         { 
03498                 return (_attr && _attr->Name) ? _attr->Name : XML_TEXT(""); 
03499         } 
03500  
03501         const char_t* Attribute::Value() const 
03502         { 
03503                 return (_attr && _attr->Value) ? _attr->Value : XML_TEXT(""); 
03504         } 
03505  
03506         size_t Attribute::HashValue() const 
03507         { 
03508                 return static_cast<size_t>(reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(_attr) / sizeof(AttributeStruct)); 
03509         } 
03510  
03511         AttributeStruct* Attribute::InternalObject() const 
03512         { 
03513                 return _attr; 
03514         } 
03515  
03516         Attribute& Attribute::operator=(const char_t* rhs) 
03517         { 
03518                 SetValue(rhs); 
03519                 return *this; 
03520         } 
03521          
03522         Attribute& Attribute::operator=(int rhs) 
03523         { 
03524                 SetValue(rhs); 
03525                 return *this; 
03526         } 
03527  
03528         Attribute& Attribute::operator=(unsigned int rhs) 
03529         { 
03530                 SetValue(rhs); 
03531                 return *this; 
03532         } 
03533  
03534         Attribute& Attribute::operator=(double rhs) 
03535         { 
03536                 SetValue(rhs); 
03537                 return *this; 
03538         } 
03539          
03540         Attribute& Attribute::operator=(bool rhs) 
03541         { 
03542                 SetValue(rhs); 
03543                 return *this; 
03544         } 
03545  
03546         bool Attribute::SetName(const char_t* rhs) 
03547         { 
03548                 if (!_attr) return false; 
03549                  
03550                 return strcpy_insitu(_attr->Name, _attr->header, MemoryPage_Name_allocated_mask, rhs); 
03551         } 
03552                  
03553         bool Attribute::SetValue(const char_t* rhs) 
03554         { 
03555                 if (!_attr) return false; 
03556  
03557                 return strcpy_insitu(_attr->Value, _attr->header, MemoryPage_Value_allocated_mask, rhs); 
03558         } 
03559  
03560         bool Attribute::SetValue(int rhs) 
03561         { 
03562                 char buf[128]; 
03563                 sprintf(buf, "%d", rhs); 
03564          
03565         #ifdef XML_WCHAR_MODE 
03566                 char_t wbuf[128]; 
03567                 widen_ascii(wbuf, buf); 
03568  
03569                 return SetValue(wbuf); 
03570         #else 
03571                 return SetValue(buf); 
03572         #endif 
03573         } 
03574  
03575         bool Attribute::SetValue(unsigned int rhs) 
03576         { 
03577                 char buf[128]; 
03578                 sprintf(buf, "%u", rhs); 
03579  
03580         #ifdef XML_WCHAR_MODE 
03581                 char_t wbuf[128]; 
03582                 widen_ascii(wbuf, buf); 
03583  
03584                 return SetValue(wbuf); 
03585         #else 
03586                 return SetValue(buf); 
03587         #endif 
03588         } 
03589  
03590         bool Attribute::SetValue(double rhs) 
03591         { 
03592                 char buf[128]; 
03593                 sprintf(buf, "%g", rhs); 
03594  
03595         #ifdef XML_WCHAR_MODE 
03596                 char_t wbuf[128]; 
03597                 widen_ascii(wbuf, buf); 
03598  
03599                 return SetValue(wbuf); 
03600         #else 
03601                 return SetValue(buf); 
03602         #endif 
03603         } 
03604          
03605         bool Attribute::SetValue(bool rhs) 
03606         { 
03607                 return SetValue(rhs ? XML_TEXT("true") : XML_TEXT("false")); 
03608         } 
03609  
03610 #ifdef __BORLANDC__ 
03611         bool operator&&(const Attribute& lhs, bool rhs) 
03612         { 
03613                 return (bool)lhs && rhs; 
03614         } 
03615  
03616         bool operator||(const Attribute& lhs, bool rhs) 
03617         { 
03618                 return (bool)lhs || rhs; 
03619         } 
03620 #endif 
03621  
03622         Node::Node(): _GetRoot(0) 
03623         { 
03624         } 
03625  
03626         Node::Node(NodeStruct* p): _GetRoot(p) 
03627         { 
03628         } 
03629          
03630         Node::operator Node::unspecified_bool_type() const 
03631         { 
03632                 return _GetRoot ? &Node::_GetRoot : 0; 
03633         } 
03634  
03635         bool Node::operator!() const 
03636         { 
03637                 return !_GetRoot; 
03638         } 
03639  
03640         Node::iterator Node::begin() const 
03641         { 
03642                 return iterator(_GetRoot ? _GetRoot->GetFirstChild : 0, _GetRoot); 
03643         } 
03644  
03645         Node::iterator Node::end() const 
03646         { 
03647                 return iterator(0, _GetRoot); 
03648         } 
03649          
03650         Node::attribute_iterator Node::attributes_begin() const 
03651         { 
03652                 return attribute_iterator(_GetRoot ? _GetRoot->GetFirstAttribute : 0, _GetRoot); 
03653         } 
03654  
03655         Node::attribute_iterator Node::attributes_end() const 
03656         { 
03657                 return attribute_iterator(0, _GetRoot); 
03658         } 
03659  
03660         bool Node::operator==(const Node& r) const 
03661         { 
03662                 return (_GetRoot == r._GetRoot); 
03663         } 
03664  
03665         bool Node::operator!=(const Node& r) const 
03666         { 
03667                 return (_GetRoot != r._GetRoot); 
03668         } 
03669  
03670         bool Node::operator<(const Node& r) const 
03671         { 
03672                 return (_GetRoot < r._GetRoot); 
03673         } 
03674          
03675         bool Node::operator>(const Node& r) const 
03676         { 
03677                 return (_GetRoot > r._GetRoot); 
03678         } 
03679          
03680         bool Node::operator<=(const Node& r) const 
03681         { 
03682                 return (_GetRoot <= r._GetRoot); 
03683         } 
03684          
03685         bool Node::operator>=(const Node& r) const 
03686         { 
03687                 return (_GetRoot >= r._GetRoot); 
03688         } 
03689  
03690         bool Node::Empty() const 
03691         { 
03692                 return !_GetRoot; 
03693         } 
03694          
03695         const char_t* Node::Name() const 
03696         { 
03697                 return (_GetRoot && _GetRoot->Name) ? _GetRoot->Name : XML_TEXT(""); 
03698         } 
03699  
03700         NodeType Node::Type() const 
03701         { 
03702                 return _GetRoot ? static_cast<NodeType>((_GetRoot->header & MemoryPage_type_mask) + 1) : NodeNull; 
03703         } 
03704          
03705         const char_t* Node::Value() const 
03706         { 
03707                 return (_GetRoot && _GetRoot->Value) ? _GetRoot->Value : XML_TEXT(""); 
03708         } 
03709          
03710         Node Node::GetChild(const char_t* Name) const 
03711         { 
03712                 if (!_GetRoot) return Node(); 
03713  
03714                 for (NodeStruct* i = _GetRoot->GetFirstChild; i; i = i->GetNextSibling) 
03715                         if (i->Name && strequal(Name, i->Name)) return Node(i); 
03716  
03717                 return Node(); 
03718         } 
03719  
03720         Attribute Node::GetAttribute(const char_t* Name) const 
03721         { 
03722                 if (!_GetRoot) return Attribute(); 
03723  
03724                 for (AttributeStruct* i = _GetRoot->GetFirstAttribute; i; i = i->GetNextAttribute) 
03725                         if (i->Name && strequal(Name, i->Name)) 
03726                                 return Attribute(i); 
03727                  
03728                 return Attribute(); 
03729         } 
03730          
03731         Node Node::GetNextSibling(const char_t* Name) const 
03732         { 
03733                 if (!_GetRoot) return Node(); 
03734                  
03735                 for (NodeStruct* i = _GetRoot->GetNextSibling; i; i = i->GetNextSibling) 
03736                         if (i->Name && strequal(Name, i->Name)) return Node(i); 
03737  
03738                 return Node(); 
03739         } 
03740  
03741         Node Node::GetNextSibling() const 
03742         { 
03743                 if (!_GetRoot) return Node(); 
03744                  
03745                 if (_GetRoot->GetNextSibling) return Node(_GetRoot->GetNextSibling); 
03746                 else return Node(); 
03747         } 
03748  
03749         Node Node::GetPreviousSibling(const char_t* Name) const 
03750         { 
03751                 if (!_GetRoot) return Node(); 
03752                  
03753                 for (NodeStruct* i = _GetRoot->prev_sibling_c; i->GetNextSibling; i = i->prev_sibling_c) 
03754                         if (i->Name && strequal(Name, i->Name)) return Node(i); 
03755  
03756                 return Node(); 
03757         } 
03758  
03759         Node Node::GetPreviousSibling() const 
03760         { 
03761                 if (!_GetRoot) return Node(); 
03762                  
03763                 if (_GetRoot->prev_sibling_c->GetNextSibling) return Node(_GetRoot->prev_sibling_c); 
03764                 else return Node(); 
03765         } 
03766  
03767         Node Node::GetParent() const 
03768         { 
03769                 return _GetRoot ? Node(_GetRoot->GetParent) : Node(); 
03770         } 
03771  
03772         Node Node::GetRoot() const 
03773         { 
03774                 if (!_GetRoot) return Node(); 
03775  
03776                 MemoryPage* page = reinterpret_cast<MemoryPage*>(_GetRoot->header & MemoryPage_pointer_mask); 
03777  
03778                 return Node(static_cast<DocumentStruct*>(page->allocator)); 
03779         } 
03780  
03781         const char_t* Node::ChildValue() const 
03782         { 
03783                 if (!_GetRoot) return XML_TEXT(""); 
03784                  
03785                 for (NodeStruct* i = _GetRoot->GetFirstChild; i; i = i->GetNextSibling) 
03786                 { 
03787                         NodeType Type = static_cast<NodeType>((i->header & MemoryPage_type_mask) + 1); 
03788  
03789                         if (i->Value && (Type == NodePcdata || Type == NodeCdata)) 
03790                                 return i->Value; 
03791                 } 
03792  
03793                 return XML_TEXT(""); 
03794         } 
03795  
03796         const char_t* Node::ChildValue(const char_t* Name) const 
03797         { 
03798                 return GetChild(Name).ChildValue(); 
03799         } 
03800  
03801         Attribute Node::GetFirstAttribute() const 
03802         { 
03803                 return _GetRoot ? Attribute(_GetRoot->GetFirstAttribute) : Attribute(); 
03804         } 
03805  
03806         Attribute Node::GetLastAttribute() const 
03807         { 
03808                 return _GetRoot && _GetRoot->GetFirstAttribute ? Attribute(_GetRoot->GetFirstAttribute->prev_attribute_c) : Attribute(); 
03809         } 
03810  
03811         Node Node::GetFirstChild() const 
03812         { 
03813                 return _GetRoot ? Node(_GetRoot->GetFirstChild) : Node(); 
03814         } 
03815  
03816         Node Node::GetLastChild() const 
03817         { 
03818                 return _GetRoot && _GetRoot->GetFirstChild ? Node(_GetRoot->GetFirstChild->prev_sibling_c) : Node(); 
03819         } 
03820  
03821         bool Node::SetName(const char_t* rhs) 
03822         { 
03823                 switch (Type()) 
03824                 { 
03825                 case NodePi: 
03826                 case NodeDeclaration: 
03827                 case NodeElement: 
03828                         return strcpy_insitu(_GetRoot->Name, _GetRoot->header, MemoryPage_Name_allocated_mask, rhs); 
03829  
03830                 default: 
03831                         return false; 
03832                 } 
03833         } 
03834                  
03835         bool Node::SetValue(const char_t* rhs) 
03836         { 
03837                 switch (Type()) 
03838                 { 
03839                 case NodePi: 
03840                 case NodeCdata: 
03841                 case NodePcdata: 
03842                 case NodeComment: 
03843                 case NodeDocType: 
03844                         return strcpy_insitu(_GetRoot->Value, _GetRoot->header, MemoryPage_Value_allocated_mask, rhs); 
03845  
03846                 default: 
03847                         return false; 
03848                 } 
03849         } 
03850  
03851         Attribute Node::AppendAttribute(const char_t* Name) 
03852         { 
03853                 if (Type() != NodeElement && Type() != NodeDeclaration) return Attribute(); 
03854                  
03855                 Attribute a(AppendAttribute_ll(_GetRoot, GetAllocator(_GetRoot))); 
03856                 a.SetName(Name); 
03857                  
03858                 return a; 
03859         } 
03860  
03861         Attribute Node::PrependAttribute(const char_t* Name) 
03862         { 
03863                 if (Type() != NodeElement && Type() != NodeDeclaration) return Attribute(); 
03864                  
03865                 Attribute a(allocate_attribute(GetAllocator(_GetRoot))); 
03866                 if (!a) return Attribute(); 
03867  
03868                 a.SetName(Name); 
03869                  
03870                 AttributeStruct* head = _GetRoot->GetFirstAttribute; 
03871  
03872                 if (head) 
03873                 { 
03874                         a._attr->prev_attribute_c = head->prev_attribute_c; 
03875                         head->prev_attribute_c = a._attr; 
03876                 } 
03877                 else 
03878                         a._attr->prev_attribute_c = a._attr; 
03879                  
03880                 a._attr->GetNextAttribute = head; 
03881                 _GetRoot->GetFirstAttribute = a._attr; 
03882                                  
03883                 return a; 
03884         } 
03885  
03886         Attribute Node::InsertAttributeBefore(const char_t* Name, const Attribute& attr) 
03887         { 
03888                 if ((Type() != NodeElement && Type() != NodeDeclaration) || attr.Empty()) return Attribute(); 
03889                  
03890                 // check that GetAttribute belongs to *this 
03891                 AttributeStruct* cur = attr._attr; 
03892  
03893                 while (cur->prev_attribute_c->GetNextAttribute) cur = cur->prev_attribute_c; 
03894  
03895                 if (cur != _GetRoot->GetFirstAttribute) return Attribute(); 
03896  
03897                 Attribute a(allocate_attribute(GetAllocator(_GetRoot))); 
03898                 if (!a) return Attribute(); 
03899  
03900                 a.SetName(Name); 
03901  
03902                 if (attr._attr->prev_attribute_c->GetNextAttribute) 
03903                         attr._attr->prev_attribute_c->GetNextAttribute = a._attr; 
03904                 else 
03905                         _GetRoot->GetFirstAttribute = a._attr; 
03906                  
03907                 a._attr->prev_attribute_c = attr._attr->prev_attribute_c; 
03908                 a._attr->GetNextAttribute = attr._attr; 
03909                 attr._attr->prev_attribute_c = a._attr; 
03910                                  
03911                 return a; 
03912         } 
03913  
03914         Attribute Node::InsertAttributeAfter(const char_t* Name, const Attribute& attr) 
03915         { 
03916                 if ((Type() != NodeElement && Type() != NodeDeclaration) || attr.Empty()) return Attribute(); 
03917                  
03918                 // check that GetAttribute belongs to *this 
03919                 AttributeStruct* cur = attr._attr; 
03920  
03921                 while (cur->prev_attribute_c->GetNextAttribute) cur = cur->prev_attribute_c; 
03922  
03923                 if (cur != _GetRoot->GetFirstAttribute) return Attribute(); 
03924  
03925                 Attribute a(allocate_attribute(GetAllocator(_GetRoot))); 
03926                 if (!a) return Attribute(); 
03927  
03928                 a.SetName(Name); 
03929  
03930                 if (attr._attr->GetNextAttribute) 
03931                         attr._attr->GetNextAttribute->prev_attribute_c = a._attr; 
03932                 else 
03933                         _GetRoot->GetFirstAttribute->prev_attribute_c = a._attr; 
03934                  
03935                 a._attr->GetNextAttribute = attr._attr->GetNextAttribute; 
03936                 a._attr->prev_attribute_c = attr._attr; 
03937                 attr._attr->GetNextAttribute = a._attr; 
03938  
03939                 return a; 
03940         } 
03941  
03942         Attribute Node::AppendCopy(const Attribute& proto) 
03943         { 
03944                 if (!proto) return Attribute(); 
03945  
03946                 Attribute Result = AppendAttribute(proto.Name()); 
03947                 Result.SetValue(proto.Value()); 
03948  
03949                 return Result; 
03950         } 
03951  
03952         Attribute Node::PrependCopy(const Attribute& proto) 
03953         { 
03954                 if (!proto) return Attribute(); 
03955  
03956                 Attribute Result = PrependAttribute(proto.Name()); 
03957                 Result.SetValue(proto.Value()); 
03958  
03959                 return Result; 
03960         } 
03961  
03962         Attribute Node::InsertCopyAfter(const Attribute& proto, const Attribute& attr) 
03963         { 
03964                 if (!proto) return Attribute(); 
03965  
03966                 Attribute Result = InsertAttributeAfter(proto.Name(), attr); 
03967                 Result.SetValue(proto.Value()); 
03968  
03969                 return Result; 
03970         } 
03971  
03972         Attribute Node::InsertCopyBefore(const Attribute& proto, const Attribute& attr) 
03973         { 
03974                 if (!proto) return Attribute(); 
03975  
03976                 Attribute Result = InsertAttributeBefore(proto.Name(), attr); 
03977                 Result.SetValue(proto.Value()); 
03978  
03979                 return Result; 
03980         } 
03981  
03982         Node Node::AppendChild(NodeType Type) 
03983         { 
03984                 if (!allow_InsertChild(this->Type(), Type)) return Node(); 
03985                  
03986                 Node n(AppendNode(_GetRoot, GetAllocator(_GetRoot), Type)); 
03987  
03988                 if (Type == NodeDeclaration) n.SetName(XML_TEXT("xml")); 
03989  
03990                 return n; 
03991         } 
03992  
03993         Node Node::PrependChild(NodeType Type) 
03994         { 
03995                 if (!allow_InsertChild(this->Type(), Type)) return Node(); 
03996                  
03997                 Node n(allocate_node(GetAllocator(_GetRoot), Type)); 
03998                 if (!n) return Node(); 
03999  
04000                 n._GetRoot->GetParent = _GetRoot; 
04001  
04002                 NodeStruct* head = _GetRoot->GetFirstChild; 
04003  
04004                 if (head) 
04005                 { 
04006                         n._GetRoot->prev_sibling_c = head->prev_sibling_c; 
04007                         head->prev_sibling_c = n._GetRoot; 
04008                 } 
04009                 else 
04010                         n._GetRoot->prev_sibling_c = n._GetRoot; 
04011                  
04012                 n._GetRoot->GetNextSibling = head; 
04013                 _GetRoot->GetFirstChild = n._GetRoot; 
04014                                  
04015                 if (Type == NodeDeclaration) n.SetName(XML_TEXT("xml")); 
04016  
04017                 return n; 
04018         } 
04019  
04020         Node Node::InsertChildBefore(NodeType Type, const Node& node) 
04021         { 
04022                 if (!allow_InsertChild(this->Type(), Type)) return Node(); 
04023                 if (!node._GetRoot || node._GetRoot->GetParent != _GetRoot) return Node(); 
04024          
04025                 Node n(allocate_node(GetAllocator(_GetRoot), Type)); 
04026                 if (!n) return Node(); 
04027  
04028                 n._GetRoot->GetParent = _GetRoot; 
04029                  
04030                 if (node._GetRoot->prev_sibling_c->GetNextSibling) 
04031                         node._GetRoot->prev_sibling_c->GetNextSibling = n._GetRoot; 
04032                 else 
04033                         _GetRoot->GetFirstChild = n._GetRoot; 
04034                  
04035                 n._GetRoot->prev_sibling_c = node._GetRoot->prev_sibling_c; 
04036                 n._GetRoot->GetNextSibling = node._GetRoot; 
04037                 node._GetRoot->prev_sibling_c = n._GetRoot; 
04038  
04039                 if (Type == NodeDeclaration) n.SetName(XML_TEXT("xml")); 
04040  
04041                 return n; 
04042         } 
04043  
04044         Node Node::InsertChildAfter(NodeType Type, const Node& node) 
04045         { 
04046                 if (!allow_InsertChild(this->Type(), Type)) return Node(); 
04047                 if (!node._GetRoot || node._GetRoot->GetParent != _GetRoot) return Node(); 
04048          
04049                 Node n(allocate_node(GetAllocator(_GetRoot), Type)); 
04050                 if (!n) return Node(); 
04051  
04052                 n._GetRoot->GetParent = _GetRoot; 
04053          
04054                 if (node._GetRoot->GetNextSibling) 
04055                         node._GetRoot->GetNextSibling->prev_sibling_c = n._GetRoot; 
04056                 else 
04057                         _GetRoot->GetFirstChild->prev_sibling_c = n._GetRoot; 
04058                  
04059                 n._GetRoot->GetNextSibling = node._GetRoot->GetNextSibling; 
04060                 n._GetRoot->prev_sibling_c = node._GetRoot; 
04061                 node._GetRoot->GetNextSibling = n._GetRoot; 
04062  
04063                 if (Type == NodeDeclaration) n.SetName(XML_TEXT("xml")); 
04064  
04065                 return n; 
04066         } 
04067  
04068         Node Node::AppendChild(const char_t* Name) 
04069         { 
04070                 Node Result = AppendChild(NodeElement); 
04071  
04072                 Result.SetName(Name); 
04073  
04074                 return Result; 
04075         } 
04076  
04077         Node Node::PrependChild(const char_t* Name) 
04078         { 
04079                 Node Result = PrependChild(NodeElement); 
04080  
04081                 Result.SetName(Name); 
04082  
04083                 return Result; 
04084         } 
04085  
04086         Node Node::InsertChildAfter(const char_t* Name, const Node& node) 
04087         { 
04088                 Node Result = InsertChildAfter(NodeElement, node); 
04089  
04090                 Result.SetName(Name); 
04091  
04092                 return Result; 
04093         } 
04094  
04095         Node Node::InsertChildBefore(const char_t* Name, const Node& node) 
04096         { 
04097                 Node Result = InsertChildBefore(NodeElement, node); 
04098  
04099                 Result.SetName(Name); 
04100  
04101                 return Result; 
04102         } 
04103  
04104         Node Node::AppendCopy(const Node& proto) 
04105         { 
04106                 Node Result = AppendChild(proto.Type()); 
04107  
04108                 if (Result) recursive_copy_skip(Result, proto, Result); 
04109  
04110                 return Result; 
04111         } 
04112  
04113         Node Node::PrependCopy(const Node& proto) 
04114         { 
04115                 Node Result = PrependChild(proto.Type()); 
04116  
04117                 if (Result) recursive_copy_skip(Result, proto, Result); 
04118  
04119                 return Result; 
04120         } 
04121  
04122         Node Node::InsertCopyAfter(const Node& proto, const Node& node) 
04123         { 
04124                 Node Result = InsertChildAfter(proto.Type(), node); 
04125  
04126                 if (Result) recursive_copy_skip(Result, proto, Result); 
04127  
04128                 return Result; 
04129         } 
04130  
04131         Node Node::InsertCopyBefore(const Node& proto, const Node& node) 
04132         { 
04133                 Node Result = InsertChildBefore(proto.Type(), node); 
04134  
04135                 if (Result) recursive_copy_skip(Result, proto, Result); 
04136  
04137                 return Result; 
04138         } 
04139  
04140         bool Node::RemoveAttribute(const char_t* Name) 
04141         { 
04142                 return RemoveAttribute(GetAttribute(Name)); 
04143         } 
04144  
04145         bool Node::RemoveAttribute(const Attribute& a) 
04146         { 
04147                 if (!_GetRoot || !a._attr) return false; 
04148  
04149                 // check that GetAttribute belongs to *this 
04150                 AttributeStruct* attr = a._attr; 
04151  
04152                 while (attr->prev_attribute_c->GetNextAttribute) attr = attr->prev_attribute_c; 
04153  
04154                 if (attr != _GetRoot->GetFirstAttribute) return false; 
04155  
04156                 if (a._attr->GetNextAttribute) a._attr->GetNextAttribute->prev_attribute_c = a._attr->prev_attribute_c; 
04157                 else if (_GetRoot->GetFirstAttribute) _GetRoot->GetFirstAttribute->prev_attribute_c = a._attr->prev_attribute_c; 
04158                  
04159                 if (a._attr->prev_attribute_c->GetNextAttribute) a._attr->prev_attribute_c->GetNextAttribute = a._attr->GetNextAttribute; 
04160                 else _GetRoot->GetFirstAttribute = a._attr->GetNextAttribute; 
04161  
04162                 destroy_attribute(a._attr, GetAllocator(_GetRoot)); 
04163  
04164                 return true; 
04165         } 
04166  
04167         bool Node::RemoveChild(const char_t* Name) 
04168         { 
04169                 return RemoveChild(GetChild(Name)); 
04170         } 
04171  
04172         bool Node::RemoveChild(const Node& n) 
04173         { 
04174                 if (!_GetRoot || !n._GetRoot || n._GetRoot->GetParent != _GetRoot) return false; 
04175  
04176                 if (n._GetRoot->GetNextSibling) n._GetRoot->GetNextSibling->prev_sibling_c = n._GetRoot->prev_sibling_c; 
04177                 else if (_GetRoot->GetFirstChild) _GetRoot->GetFirstChild->prev_sibling_c = n._GetRoot->prev_sibling_c; 
04178                  
04179                 if (n._GetRoot->prev_sibling_c->GetNextSibling) n._GetRoot->prev_sibling_c->GetNextSibling = n._GetRoot->GetNextSibling; 
04180                 else _GetRoot->GetFirstChild = n._GetRoot->GetNextSibling; 
04181                  
04182                 destroy_node(n._GetRoot, GetAllocator(_GetRoot)); 
04183  
04184                 return true; 
04185         } 
04186  
04187         Node Node::FindChildbyAttribute(const char_t* Name, const char_t* AttrName, const char_t* AttrValue) const 
04188         { 
04189                 if (!_GetRoot) return Node(); 
04190                  
04191                 for (NodeStruct* i = _GetRoot->GetFirstChild; i; i = i->GetNextSibling) 
04192                         if (i->Name && strequal(Name, i->Name)) 
04193                         { 
04194                                 for (AttributeStruct* a = i->GetFirstAttribute; a; a = a->GetNextAttribute) 
04195                                         if (strequal(AttrName, a->Name) && strequal(AttrValue, a->Value)) 
04196                                                 return Node(i); 
04197                         } 
04198  
04199                 return Node(); 
04200         } 
04201  
04202         Node Node::FindChildbyAttribute(const char_t* AttrName, const char_t* AttrValue) const 
04203         { 
04204                 if (!_GetRoot) return Node(); 
04205                  
04206                 for (NodeStruct* i = _GetRoot->GetFirstChild; i; i = i->GetNextSibling) 
04207                         for (AttributeStruct* a = i->GetFirstAttribute; a; a = a->GetNextAttribute) 
04208                                 if (strequal(AttrName, a->Name) && strequal(AttrValue, a->Value)) 
04209                                         return Node(i); 
04210  
04211                 return Node(); 
04212         } 
04213  
04214 #ifndef XML_NO_STL 
04215         String Node::Path(char_t delimiter) const 
04216         { 
04217                 String Path; 
04218  
04219                 Node cursor = *this; // Make a copy. 
04220                  
04221                 Path = cursor.Name(); 
04222  
04223                 while (cursor.GetParent()) 
04224                 { 
04225                         cursor = cursor.GetParent(); 
04226                          
04227                         String temp = cursor.Name(); 
04228                         temp += delimiter; 
04229                         temp += Path; 
04230                         Path.swap(temp); 
04231                 } 
04232  
04233                 return Path; 
04234         } 
04235 #endif 
04236  
04237         Node Node::FirstElementByPath(const char_t* Path, char_t delimiter) const 
04238         { 
04239                 Node found = *this; // Current search context. 
04240  
04241                 if (!_GetRoot || !Path || !Path[0]) return found; 
04242  
04243                 if (Path[0] == delimiter) 
04244                 { 
04245                         // Absolute Path; e.g. '/foo/bar' 
04246                         found = found.GetRoot(); 
04247                         ++Path; 
04248                 } 
04249  
04250                 const char_t* Path_segment = Path; 
04251  
04252                 while (*Path_segment == delimiter) ++Path_segment; 
04253  
04254                 const char_t* Path_segment_end = Path_segment; 
04255  
04256                 while (*Path_segment_end && *Path_segment_end != delimiter) ++Path_segment_end; 
04257  
04258                 if (Path_segment == Path_segment_end) return found; 
04259  
04260                 const char_t* NextSegment = Path_segment_end; 
04261  
04262                 while (*NextSegment == delimiter) ++NextSegment; 
04263  
04264                 if (*Path_segment == '.' && Path_segment + 1 == Path_segment_end) 
04265                         return found.FirstElementByPath(NextSegment, delimiter); 
04266                 else if (*Path_segment == '.' && *(Path_segment+1) == '.' && Path_segment + 2 == Path_segment_end) 
04267                         return found.GetParent().FirstElementByPath(NextSegment, delimiter); 
04268                 else 
04269                 { 
04270                         for (NodeStruct* j = found._GetRoot->GetFirstChild; j; j = j->GetNextSibling) 
04271                         { 
04272                                 if (j->Name && strequalrange(j->Name, Path_segment, static_cast<size_t>(Path_segment_end - Path_segment))) 
04273                                 { 
04274                                         Node subsearch = Node(j).FirstElementByPath(NextSegment, delimiter); 
04275  
04276                                         if (subsearch) return subsearch; 
04277                                 } 
04278                         } 
04279  
04280                         return Node(); 
04281                 } 
04282         } 
04283  
04284         bool Node::Traverse(TreeWalker& walker) 
04285         { 
04286                 walker._Depth = -1; 
04287                  
04288                 Node arg_begin = *this; 
04289                 if (!walker.begin(arg_begin)) return false; 
04290  
04291                 Node cur = GetFirstChild(); 
04292                                  
04293                 if (cur) 
04294                 { 
04295                         ++walker._Depth; 
04296  
04297                         do  
04298                         { 
04299                                 Node arg_for_each = cur; 
04300                                 if (!walker.for_each(arg_for_each)) 
04301                                         return false; 
04302                                                  
04303                                 if (cur.GetFirstChild()) 
04304                                 { 
04305                                         ++walker._Depth; 
04306                                         cur = cur.GetFirstChild(); 
04307                                 } 
04308                                 else if (cur.GetNextSibling()) 
04309                                         cur = cur.GetNextSibling(); 
04310                                 else 
04311                                 { 
04312                                         // Borland C++ workaround 
04313                                         while (!cur.GetNextSibling() && cur != *this && (bool)cur.GetParent()) 
04314                                         { 
04315                                                 --walker._Depth; 
04316                                                 cur = cur.GetParent(); 
04317                                         } 
04318                                                  
04319                                         if (cur != *this) 
04320                                                 cur = cur.GetNextSibling(); 
04321                                 } 
04322                         } 
04323                         while (cur && cur != *this); 
04324                 } 
04325  
04326                 assert(walker._Depth == -1); 
04327  
04328                 Node arg_end = *this; 
04329                 return walker.end(arg_end); 
04330         } 
04331  
04332         size_t Node::HashValue() const 
04333         { 
04334                 return static_cast<size_t>(reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(_GetRoot) / sizeof(NodeStruct)); 
04335         } 
04336  
04337         NodeStruct* Node::InternalObject() const 
04338         { 
04339                 return _GetRoot; 
04340         } 
04341  
04342         void Node::Print(Writer& WriterInstance, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, Encoding DocumentEncoding, unsigned int Depth) const 
04343         { 
04344                 if (!_GetRoot) return; 
04345  
04346                 BufferedWriter buffered_WriterInstance(WriterInstance, DocumentEncoding); 
04347  
04348                 NodeOutput(buffered_WriterInstance, *this, indent, flags, Depth); 
04349         } 
04350  
04351 #ifndef XML_NO_STL 
04352         void Node::Print(std::basic_ostream<char, std::char_traits<char> >& stream, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, Encoding DocumentEncoding, unsigned int Depth) const 
04353         { 
04354                 WriterStream WriterInstance(stream); 
04355  
04356                 Print(WriterInstance, indent, flags, DocumentEncoding, Depth); 
04357         } 
04358  
04359         void Node::Print(std::basic_ostream<wchar_t, std::char_traits<wchar_t> >& stream, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, unsigned int Depth) const 
04360         { 
04361                 WriterStream WriterInstance(stream); 
04362  
04363                 Print(WriterInstance, indent, flags, Encodingwchar_t, Depth); 
04364         } 
04365 #endif 
04366  
04367         ptrdiff_t Node::OffSetDebug() const 
04368         { 
04369                 NodeStruct* r = GetRoot()._GetRoot; 
04370  
04371                 if (!r) return -1; 
04372  
04373                 const char_t* buffer = static_cast<DocumentStruct*>(r)->buffer; 
04374  
04375                 if (!buffer) return -1; 
04376  
04377                 switch (Type()) 
04378                 { 
04379                 case NodeDocument: 
04380                         return 0; 
04381  
04382                 case NodeElement: 
04383                 case NodeDeclaration: 
04384                 case NodePi: 
04385                         return (_GetRoot->header & MemoryPage_Name_allocated_mask) ? -1 : _GetRoot->Name - buffer; 
04386  
04387                 case NodePcdata: 
04388                 case NodeCdata: 
04389                 case NodeComment: 
04390                 case NodeDocType: 
04391                         return (_GetRoot->header & MemoryPage_Value_allocated_mask) ? -1 : _GetRoot->Value - buffer; 
04392  
04393                 default: 
04394                         return -1; 
04395                 } 
04396         } 
04397  
04398 #ifdef __BORLANDC__ 
04399         bool operator&&(const Node& lhs, bool rhs) 
04400         { 
04401                 return (bool)lhs && rhs; 
04402         } 
04403  
04404         bool operator||(const Node& lhs, bool rhs) 
04405         { 
04406                 return (bool)lhs || rhs; 
04407         } 
04408 #endif 
04409  
04410         NodeIterator::NodeIterator() 
04411         { 
04412         } 
04413  
04414         NodeIterator::NodeIterator(const Node& node): _wrap(node), _GetParent(node.GetParent()) 
04415         { 
04416         } 
04417  
04418         NodeIterator::NodeIterator(NodeStruct* ref, NodeStruct* GetParent): _wrap(ref), _GetParent(GetParent) 
04419         { 
04420         } 
04421  
04422         bool NodeIterator::operator==(const NodeIterator& rhs) const 
04423         { 
04424                 return _wrap._GetRoot == rhs._wrap._GetRoot && _GetParent._GetRoot == rhs._GetParent._GetRoot; 
04425         } 
04426          
04427         bool NodeIterator::operator!=(const NodeIterator& rhs) const 
04428         { 
04429                 return _wrap._GetRoot != rhs._wrap._GetRoot || _GetParent._GetRoot != rhs._GetParent._GetRoot; 
04430         } 
04431  
04432         Node& NodeIterator::operator*() 
04433         { 
04434                 assert(_wrap._GetRoot); 
04435                 return _wrap; 
04436         } 
04437  
04438         Node* NodeIterator::operator->() 
04439         { 
04440                 assert(_wrap._GetRoot); 
04441                 return &_wrap; 
04442         } 
04443  
04444         const NodeIterator& NodeIterator::operator++() 
04445         { 
04446                 assert(_wrap._GetRoot); 
04447                 _wrap._GetRoot = _wrap._GetRoot->GetNextSibling; 
04448                 return *this; 
04449         } 
04450  
04451         NodeIterator NodeIterator::operator++(int) 
04452         { 
04453                 NodeIterator temp = *this; 
04454                 ++*this; 
04455                 return temp; 
04456         } 
04457  
04458         const NodeIterator& NodeIterator::operator--() 
04459         { 
04460                 _wrap = _wrap._GetRoot ? _wrap.GetPreviousSibling() : _GetParent.GetLastChild(); 
04461                 return *this; 
04462         } 
04463  
04464         NodeIterator NodeIterator::operator--(int) 
04465         { 
04466                 NodeIterator temp = *this; 
04467                 --*this; 
04468                 return temp; 
04469         } 
04470  
04471         AttributeIterator::AttributeIterator() 
04472         { 
04473         } 
04474  
04475         AttributeIterator::AttributeIterator(const Attribute& attr, const Node& GetParent): _wrap(attr), _GetParent(GetParent) 
04476         { 
04477         } 
04478  
04479         AttributeIterator::AttributeIterator(AttributeStruct* ref, NodeStruct* GetParent): _wrap(ref), _GetParent(GetParent) 
04480         { 
04481         } 
04482  
04483         bool AttributeIterator::operator==(const AttributeIterator& rhs) const 
04484         { 
04485                 return _wrap._attr == rhs._wrap._attr && _GetParent._GetRoot == rhs._GetParent._GetRoot; 
04486         } 
04487          
04488         bool AttributeIterator::operator!=(const AttributeIterator& rhs) const 
04489         { 
04490                 return _wrap._attr != rhs._wrap._attr || _GetParent._GetRoot != rhs._GetParent._GetRoot; 
04491         } 
04492  
04493         Attribute& AttributeIterator::operator*() 
04494         { 
04495                 assert(_wrap._attr); 
04496                 return _wrap; 
04497         } 
04498  
04499         Attribute* AttributeIterator::operator->() 
04500         { 
04501                 assert(_wrap._attr); 
04502                 return &_wrap; 
04503         } 
04504  
04505         const AttributeIterator& AttributeIterator::operator++() 
04506         { 
04507                 assert(_wrap._attr); 
04508                 _wrap._attr = _wrap._attr->GetNextAttribute; 
04509                 return *this; 
04510         } 
04511  
04512         AttributeIterator AttributeIterator::operator++(int) 
04513         { 
04514                 AttributeIterator temp = *this; 
04515                 ++*this; 
04516                 return temp; 
04517         } 
04518  
04519         const AttributeIterator& AttributeIterator::operator--() 
04520         { 
04521                 _wrap = _wrap._attr ? _wrap.GetPreviousAttribute() : _GetParent.GetLastAttribute(); 
04522                 return *this; 
04523         } 
04524  
04525         AttributeIterator AttributeIterator::operator--(int) 
04526         { 
04527                 AttributeIterator temp = *this; 
04528                 --*this; 
04529                 return temp; 
04530         } 
04531  
04532         ParseResult::ParseResult(): Status(StatusInternalError), Offset(0), DocumentEncoding(EncodingAuto) 
04533         { 
04534         } 
04535  
04536         ParseResult::operator bool() const 
04537         { 
04538                 return Status == StatusOk; 
04539         } 
04540  
04541         const char* ParseResult::Description() const 
04542         { 
04543                 switch (Status) 
04544                 { 
04545                 case StatusOk: return "No error"; 
04546  
04547                 case StatusFileNotFound: return "File was not found"; 
04548                 case StatusIOError: return "Error reading from file/stream"; 
04549                 case StatusOutOfMemory: return "Could not allocate memory"; 
04550                 case StatusInternalError: return "Internal error occurred"; 
04551  
04552                 case StatusUnrecognizedTag: return "Could not determine tag Type"; 
04553  
04554                 case StatusBadPi: return "Error parsing document declaration/processing instruction"; 
04555                 case StatusBadComment: return "Error parsing comment"; 
04556                 case StatusBadCdata: return "Error parsing CDATA section"; 
04557                 case StatusBadDocType: return "Error parsing document Type declaration"; 
04558                 case StatusBadPcdata: return "Error parsing PCDATA section"; 
04559                 case StatusBadStartElement: return "Error parsing start element tag"; 
04560                 case StatusBadAttribute: return "Error parsing element GetAttribute"; 
04561                 case StatusBadEndElement: return "Error parsing end element tag"; 
04562                 case StatusEndElementMismatch: return "Start-end tags mismatch"; 
04563  
04564                 default: return "Unknown error"; 
04565                 } 
04566         } 
04567  
04568         Document::Document(): _buffer(0) 
04569         { 
04570                 create(); 
04571         } 
04572  
04573         Document::~Document() 
04574         { 
04575                 destroy(); 
04576         } 
04577  
04578         void Document::Reset() 
04579         { 
04580                 destroy(); 
04581                 create(); 
04582         } 
04583  
04584         void Document::Reset(const Document& proto) 
04585         { 
04586                 Reset(); 
04587  
04588                 for (Node cur = proto.GetFirstChild(); cur; cur = cur.GetNextSibling()) 
04589                         AppendCopy(cur); 
04590         } 
04591  
04592         void Document::create() 
04593         { 
04594                 // initialize sentinel page 
04595                 STATIC_ASSERT(offsetof(MemoryPage, data) + sizeof(DocumentStruct) + MemoryPage_alignment <= sizeof(_memory)); 
04596  
04597                 // align upwards to page boundary 
04598                 void* page_memory = reinterpret_cast<void*>((reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(_memory) + (MemoryPage_alignment - 1)) & ~(MemoryPage_alignment - 1)); 
04599  
04600                 // prepare page structure 
04601                 MemoryPage* page = MemoryPage::construct(page_memory); 
04602  
04603                 page->busy_size = MemoryPage_size; 
04604  
04605                 // allocate new GetRoot 
04606                 _GetRoot = new (page->data) DocumentStruct(page); 
04607                 _GetRoot->prev_sibling_c = _GetRoot; 
04608  
04609                 // setup sentinel page 
04610                 page->allocator = static_cast<DocumentStruct*>(_GetRoot); 
04611         } 
04612  
04613         void Document::destroy() 
04614         { 
04615                 // destroy static storage 
04616                 if (_buffer) 
04617                 { 
04618                         global_deallocate(_buffer); 
04619                         _buffer = 0; 
04620                 } 
04621  
04622                 // destroy dynamic storage, leave sentinel page (it's in static memory) 
04623                 if (_GetRoot) 
04624                 { 
04625                         MemoryPage* GetRoot_page = reinterpret_cast<MemoryPage*>(_GetRoot->header & MemoryPage_pointer_mask); 
04626                         assert(GetRoot_page && !GetRoot_page->prev && !GetRoot_page->memory); 
04627  
04628                         // destroy all pages 
04629                         for (MemoryPage* page = GetRoot_page->next; page; ) 
04630                         { 
04631                                 MemoryPage* next = page->next; 
04632  
04633                                 Allocator::deallocate_page(page); 
04634  
04635                                 page = next; 
04636                         } 
04637  
04638                         // cleanup GetRoot page 
04639                         GetRoot_page->allocator = 0; 
04640                         GetRoot_page->next = 0; 
04641                         GetRoot_page->busy_size = GetRoot_page->freed_size = 0; 
04642  
04643                         _GetRoot = 0; 
04644                 } 
04645         } 
04646  
04647 #ifndef XML_NO_STL 
04648         ParseResult Document::Load(std::basic_istream<char, std::char_traits<char> >& stream, unsigned int options, Encoding DocumentEncoding) 
04649         { 
04650                 Reset(); 
04651  
04652                 return LoadStreamImpl(*this, stream, options, DocumentEncoding); 
04653         } 
04654  
04655         ParseResult Document::Load(std::basic_istream<wchar_t, std::char_traits<wchar_t> >& stream, unsigned int options) 
04656         { 
04657                 Reset(); 
04658  
04659                 return LoadStreamImpl(*this, stream, options, Encodingwchar_t); 
04660         } 
04661 #endif 
04662  
04663         ParseResult Document::Load(const char_t* contents, unsigned int options) 
04664         { 
04665                 // Force native DocumentEncoding (skip autodetection) 
04666         #ifdef XML_WCHAR_MODE 
04667                 Encoding DocumentEncoding = Encodingwchar_t; 
04668         #else 
04669                 Encoding DocumentEncoding = EncodingUTF8; 
04670         #endif 
04671  
04672                 return LoadBuffer(contents, strlength(contents) * sizeof(char_t), options, DocumentEncoding); 
04673         } 
04674  
04675         ParseResult Document::LoadFile(const char* Path, unsigned int options, Encoding DocumentEncoding) 
04676         { 
04677                 Reset(); 
04678  
04679                 FILE* file = fopen(Path, "rb"); 
04680  
04681                 return LoadFileImpl(*this, file, options, DocumentEncoding); 
04682         } 
04683  
04684         ParseResult Document::LoadFile(const wchar_t* Path, unsigned int options, Encoding DocumentEncoding) 
04685         { 
04686                 Reset(); 
04687  
04688                 FILE* file = open_file_wide(Path, L"rb"); 
04689  
04690                 return LoadFileImpl(*this, file, options, DocumentEncoding); 
04691         } 
04692  
04693         ParseResult Document::LoadBufferImpl(void* contents, size_t size, unsigned int options, Encoding DocumentEncoding, bool is_mutable, bool own) 
04694         { 
04695                 Reset(); 
04696  
04697                 // check input buffer 
04698                 assert(contents || size == 0); 
04699  
04700                 // get actual DocumentEncoding 
04701                 Encoding buffer_DocumentEncoding = GetBuffer_DocumentEncoding(DocumentEncoding, contents, size); 
04702  
04703                 // get private buffer 
04704                 char_t* buffer = 0; 
04705                 size_t length = 0; 
04706  
04707                 if (!convert_buffer(buffer, length, buffer_DocumentEncoding, contents, size, is_mutable)) return make_ParseResult(StatusOutOfMemory); 
04708                  
04709                 // delete original buffer if we performed a conversion 
04710                 if (own && buffer != contents && contents) global_deallocate(contents); 
04711  
04712                 // parse 
04713                 ParseResult res = Parser::parse(buffer, length, _GetRoot, options); 
04714  
04715                 // remember DocumentEncoding 
04716                 res.DocumentEncoding = buffer_DocumentEncoding; 
04717  
04718                 // grab onto buffer if it's our buffer, user is responsible for deallocating contens himself 
04719                 if (own || buffer != contents) _buffer = buffer; 
04720  
04721                 return res; 
04722         } 
04723  
04724         ParseResult Document::LoadBuffer(const void* contents, size_t size, unsigned int options, Encoding DocumentEncoding) 
04725         { 
04726                 return LoadBufferImpl(const_cast<void*>(contents), size, options, DocumentEncoding, false, false); 
04727         } 
04728  
04729         ParseResult Document::LoadBufferInplace(void* contents, size_t size, unsigned int options, Encoding DocumentEncoding) 
04730         { 
04731                 return LoadBufferImpl(contents, size, options, DocumentEncoding, true, false); 
04732         } 
04733                  
04734         ParseResult Document::LoadBufferInplaceOwn(void* contents, size_t size, unsigned int options, Encoding DocumentEncoding) 
04735         { 
04736                 return LoadBufferImpl(contents, size, options, DocumentEncoding, true, true); 
04737         } 
04738  
04739         void Document::Save(Writer& WriterInstance, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, Encoding DocumentEncoding) const 
04740         { 
04741                 if (flags & FormatWriteBom) Write_bom(WriterInstance, GetWrite_DocumentEncoding(DocumentEncoding)); 
04742  
04743                 BufferedWriter buffered_WriterInstance(WriterInstance, DocumentEncoding); 
04744  
04745                 if (!(flags & FormatNoDeclaration) && !hAsDeclaration(*this)) 
04746                 { 
04747                         buffered_WriterInstance.Write(XML_TEXT("<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>")); 
04748                         if (!(flags & FormatRaw)) buffered_WriterInstance.Write('\n'); 
04749                 } 
04750  
04751                 NodeOutput(buffered_WriterInstance, *this, indent, flags, 0); 
04752         } 
04753  
04754 #ifndef XML_NO_STL 
04755         void Document::Save(std::basic_ostream<char, std::char_traits<char> >& stream, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, Encoding DocumentEncoding) const 
04756         { 
04757                 WriterStream WriterInstance(stream); 
04758  
04759                 Save(WriterInstance, indent, flags, DocumentEncoding); 
04760         } 
04761  
04762         void Document::Save(std::basic_ostream<wchar_t, std::char_traits<wchar_t> >& stream, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags) const 
04763         { 
04764                 WriterStream WriterInstance(stream); 
04765  
04766                 Save(WriterInstance, indent, flags, Encodingwchar_t); 
04767         } 
04768 #endif 
04769  
04770         bool Document::SaveFile(const char* Path, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, Encoding DocumentEncoding) const 
04771         { 
04772                 FILE* file = fopen(Path, "wb"); 
04773                 if (!file) return false; 
04774  
04775                 WriterFile WriterInstance(file); 
04776                 Save(WriterInstance, indent, flags, DocumentEncoding); 
04777  
04778                 fclose(file); 
04779  
04780                 return true; 
04781         } 
04782  
04783         bool Document::SaveFile(const wchar_t* Path, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, Encoding DocumentEncoding) const 
04784         { 
04785                 FILE* file = open_file_wide(Path, L"wb"); 
04786                 if (!file) return false; 
04787  
04788                 WriterFile WriterInstance(file); 
04789                 Save(WriterInstance, indent, flags, DocumentEncoding); 
04790  
04791                 fclose(file); 
04792  
04793                 return true; 
04794         } 
04795  
04796         Node Document::DocumentElement() const 
04797         { 
04798                 for (NodeStruct* i = _GetRoot->GetFirstChild; i; i = i->GetNextSibling) 
04799                         if ((i->header & MemoryPage_type_mask) + 1 == NodeElement) 
04800                                 return Node(i); 
04801  
04802                 return Node(); 
04803         } 
04804  
04805 #ifndef XML_NO_STL 
04806         std::string PHYS_LIB AsUtf8(const wchar_t* str) 
04807         { 
04808                 assert(str); 
04809  
04810                 return AsUtf8_impl(str, wcslen(str)); 
04811         } 
04812  
04813         std::string PHYS_LIB AsUtf8(const std::wstring& str) 
04814         { 
04815                 return AsUtf8_impl(str.c_str(), str.size()); 
04816         } 
04817          
04818         std::wstring PHYS_LIB AsWide(const char* str) 
04819         { 
04820                 assert(str); 
04821  
04822                 return AsWide_impl(str, strlen(str)); 
04823         } 
04824          
04825         std::wstring PHYS_LIB AsWide(const std::string& str) 
04826         { 
04827                 return AsWide_impl(str.c_str(), str.size()); 
04828         } 
04829 #endif 
04830  
04831         void PHYS_LIB SetMemory_management_functions(AllocationFunction allocate, deAllocationFunction deallocate) 
04832         { 
04833                 global_allocate = allocate; 
04834                 global_deallocate = deallocate; 
04835         } 
04836  
04837         AllocationFunction PHYS_LIB GetMemoryAllocationFunction() 
04838         { 
04839                 return global_allocate; 
04840         } 
04841  
04842         deAllocationFunction PHYS_LIB GetMemoryDeallocationFunction() 
04843         { 
04844                 return global_deallocate; 
04845         } 
04846 } 
04847 } // \phys
04848  
04849 #if !defined(XML_NO_STL) && (defined(_MSC_VER) || defined(__ICC)) 
04850 namespace std 
04851 { 
04852         // Workarounds for (non-standard) iterator category detection for older versions (MSVC7/IC8 and earlier) 
04853         std::bidirectional_iterator_tag _Iter_cat(const NodeIterator&) 
04854         { 
04855                 return std::bidirectional_iterator_tag(); 
04856         } 
04857  
04858         std::bidirectional_iterator_tag _Iter_cat(const AttributeIterator&) 
04859         { 
04860                 return std::bidirectional_iterator_tag(); 
04861         } 
04862 } 
04863 #endif 
04864  
04865 #if !defined(XML_NO_STL) && defined(__SUNPRO_CC) 
04866 namespace std 
04867 { 
04868         // Workarounds for (non-standard) iterator category detection 
04869         std::bidirectional_iterator_tag __iterator_category(const NodeIterator&) 
04870         { 
04871                 return std::bidirectional_iterator_tag(); 
04872         } 
04873  
04874         std::bidirectional_iterator_tag __iterator_category(const AttributeIterator&) 
04875         { 
04876                 return std::bidirectional_iterator_tag(); 
04877         } 
04878 } 
04879 #endif 
04880  
04881 #ifndef XML_NO_XPATH 
04882  
04883 // STL replacements 
04884 namespace 
04885 { 
04886         struct equal_to 
04887         { 
04888                 template <typename T> bool operator()(const T& lhs, const T& rhs) const 
04889                 { 
04890                         return lhs == rhs; 
04891                 } 
04892         }; 
04893  
04894         struct not_equal_to 
04895         { 
04896                 template <typename T> bool operator()(const T& lhs, const T& rhs) const 
04897                 { 
04898                         return lhs != rhs; 
04899                 } 
04900         }; 
04901  
04902         struct less 
04903         { 
04904                 template <typename T> bool operator()(const T& lhs, const T& rhs) const 
04905                 { 
04906                         return lhs < rhs; 
04907                 } 
04908         }; 
04909  
04910         struct less_equal 
04911         { 
04912                 template <typename T> bool operator()(const T& lhs, const T& rhs) const 
04913                 { 
04914                         return lhs <= rhs; 
04915                 } 
04916         }; 
04917  
04918         template <typename T> void swap(T& lhs, T& rhs) 
04919         { 
04920                 T temp = lhs; 
04921                 lhs = rhs; 
04922                 rhs = temp; 
04923         } 
04924  
04925         template <typename I, typename Pred> I min_element(I begin, I end, const Pred& pred) 
04926         { 
04927                 I Result = begin; 
04928  
04929                 for (I it = begin + 1; it != end; ++it) 
04930                         if (pred(*it, *Result)) 
04931                                 Result = it; 
04932  
04933                 return Result; 
04934         } 
04935  
04936         template <typename I> void reverse(I begin, I end) 
04937         { 
04938                 while (begin + 1 < end) swap(*begin++, *--end); 
04939         } 
04940  
04941         template <typename I> I unique(I begin, I end) 
04942         { 
04943                 // fast skip head 
04944                 while (begin + 1 < end && *begin != *(begin + 1)) begin++; 
04945  
04946                 if (begin == end) return begin; 
04947  
04948                 // last written element 
04949                 I Write = begin++;  
04950  
04951                 // merge unique elements 
04952                 while (begin != end) 
04953                 { 
04954                         if (*begin != *Write) 
04955                                 *++Write = *begin++; 
04956                         else 
04957                                 begin++; 
04958                 } 
04959  
04960                 // past-the-end (Write points to live element) 
04961                 return Write + 1; 
04962         } 
04963  
04964         template <typename I> void copy_backwards(I begin, I end, I target) 
04965         { 
04966                 while (begin != end) *--target = *--end; 
04967         } 
04968  
04969         template <typename I, typename Pred, typename T> void insertion_sort(I begin, I end, const Pred& pred, T*) 
04970         { 
04971                 assert(begin != end); 
04972  
04973                 for (I it = begin + 1; it != end; ++it) 
04974                 { 
04975                         T val = *it; 
04976  
04977                         if (pred(val, *begin)) 
04978                         { 
04979                                 // move to front 
04980                                 copy_backwards(begin, it, it + 1); 
04981                                 *begin = val; 
04982                         } 
04983                         else 
04984                         { 
04985                                 I hole = it; 
04986  
04987                                 // move hole backwards 
04988                                 while (pred(val, *(hole - 1))) 
04989                                 { 
04990                                         *hole = *(hole - 1); 
04991                                         hole--; 
04992                                 } 
04993  
04994                                 // fill hole with element 
04995                                 *hole = val; 
04996                         } 
04997                 } 
04998         } 
04999  
05000         // std variant for elements with == 
05001         template <typename I, typename Pred> void partition(I begin, I middle, I end, const Pred& pred, I* out_eqbeg, I* out_eqend) 
05002         { 
05003                 I eqbeg = middle, eqend = middle + 1; 
05004  
05005                 // expand equal range 
05006                 while (eqbeg != begin && *(eqbeg - 1) == *eqbeg) --eqbeg; 
05007                 while (eqend != end && *eqend == *eqbeg) ++eqend; 
05008  
05009                 // process outer elements 
05010                 I ltend = eqbeg, gtbeg = eqend; 
05011  
05012                 for (;;) 
05013                 { 
05014                         // find the element from the right side that belongs to the left one 
05015                         for (; gtbeg != end; ++gtbeg) 
05016                                 if (!pred(*eqbeg, *gtbeg)) 
05017                                 { 
05018                                         if (*gtbeg == *eqbeg) swap(*gtbeg, *eqend++); 
05019                                         else break; 
05020                                 } 
05021  
05022                         // find the element from the left side that belongs to the right one 
05023                         for (; ltend != begin; --ltend) 
05024                                 if (!pred(*(ltend - 1), *eqbeg)) 
05025                                 { 
05026                                         if (*eqbeg == *(ltend - 1)) swap(*(ltend - 1), *--eqbeg); 
05027                                         else break; 
05028                                 } 
05029  
05030                         // scanned all elements 
05031                         if (gtbeg == end && ltend == begin) 
05032                         { 
05033                                 *out_eqbeg = eqbeg; 
05034                                 *out_eqend = eqend; 
05035                                 return; 
05036                         } 
05037  
05038                         // make room for elements by moving equal area 
05039                         if (gtbeg == end) 
05040                         { 
05041                                 if (--ltend != --eqbeg) swap(*ltend, *eqbeg); 
05042                                 swap(*eqbeg, *--eqend); 
05043                         } 
05044                         else if (ltend == begin) 
05045                         { 
05046                                 if (eqend != gtbeg) swap(*eqbeg, *eqend); 
05047                                 ++eqend; 
05048                                 swap(*gtbeg++, *eqbeg++); 
05049                         } 
05050                         else swap(*gtbeg++, *--ltend); 
05051                 } 
05052         } 
05053  
05054         template <typename I, typename Pred> void median3(I first, I middle, I last, const Pred& pred) 
05055         { 
05056                 if (pred(*middle, *first)) swap(*middle, *first); 
05057                 if (pred(*last, *middle)) swap(*last, *middle); 
05058                 if (pred(*middle, *first)) swap(*middle, *first); 
05059         } 
05060  
05061         template <typename I, typename Pred> void median(I first, I middle, I last, const Pred& pred) 
05062         { 
05063                 if (last - first <= 40) 
05064                 { 
05065                         // median of three for small chunks 
05066                         median3(first, middle, last, pred); 
05067                 } 
05068                 else 
05069                 { 
05070                         // median of nine 
05071                         size_t step = (last - first + 1) / 8; 
05072  
05073                         median3(first, first + step, first + 2 * step, pred); 
05074                         median3(middle - step, middle, middle + step, pred); 
05075                         median3(last - 2 * step, last - step, last, pred); 
05076                         median3(first + step, middle, last - step, pred); 
05077                 } 
05078         } 
05079  
05080         template <typename I, typename Pred> void sort(I begin, I end, const Pred& pred) 
05081         { 
05082                 // sort large chunks 
05083                 while (end - begin > 32) 
05084                 { 
05085                         // find median element 
05086                         I middle = begin + (end - begin) / 2; 
05087                         median(begin, middle, end - 1, pred); 
05088  
05089                         // partition in three chunks (< = >) 
05090                         I eqbeg, eqend; 
05091                         partition(begin, middle, end, pred, &eqbeg, &eqend); 
05092  
05093                         // loop on larger half 
05094                         if (eqbeg - begin > end - eqend) 
05095                         { 
05096                                 sort(eqend, end, pred); 
05097                                 end = eqbeg; 
05098                         } 
05099                         else 
05100                         { 
05101                                 sort(begin, eqbeg, pred); 
05102                                 begin = eqend; 
05103                         } 
05104                 } 
05105  
05106                 // insertion sort small chunk 
05107                 if (begin != end) insertion_sort(begin, end, pred, &*begin); 
05108         } 
05109 } 
05110  
05111 // Allocator used for AST and evaluation stacks 
05112 namespace 
05113 { 
05114         struct XPathMemoryBlock 
05115         {        
05116                 XPathMemoryBlock* next; 
05117  
05118                 char data[4096]; 
05119         }; 
05120                  
05121         class XPathAllocator 
05122         { 
05123                 XPathMemoryBlock* _GetRoot; 
05124                 size_t _GetRoot_size; 
05125  
05126         public: 
05127         #ifdef XML_NO_EXCEPTIONS 
05128                 jmp_buf* error_handler; 
05129         #endif 
05130  
05131                 XPathAllocator(XPathMemoryBlock* GetRoot, size_t GetRoot_size = 0): _GetRoot(GetRoot), _GetRoot_size(GetRoot_size) 
05132                 { 
05133                 #ifdef XML_NO_EXCEPTIONS 
05134                         error_handler = 0; 
05135                 #endif 
05136                 } 
05137                  
05138                 void* allocate_nothrow(size_t size) 
05139                 { 
05140                         const size_t block_capacity = sizeof(_GetRoot->data); 
05141  
05142                         // align size so that we're able to store pointers in subsequent blocks 
05143                         size = (size + sizeof(void*) - 1) & ~(sizeof(void*) - 1); 
05144  
05145                         if (_GetRoot_size + size <= block_capacity) 
05146                         { 
05147                                 void* buf = _GetRoot->data + _GetRoot_size; 
05148                                 _GetRoot_size += size; 
05149                                 return buf; 
05150                         } 
05151                         else 
05152                         { 
05153                                 size_t block_data_size = (size > block_capacity) ? size : block_capacity; 
05154                                 size_t block_size = block_data_size + offsetof(XPathMemoryBlock, data); 
05155  
05156                                 XPathMemoryBlock* block = static_cast<XPathMemoryBlock*>(global_allocate(block_size)); 
05157                                 if (!block) return 0; 
05158                                  
05159                                 block->next = _GetRoot; 
05160                                  
05161                                 _GetRoot = block; 
05162                                 _GetRoot_size = size; 
05163                                  
05164                                 return block->data; 
05165                         } 
05166                 } 
05167  
05168                 void* allocate(size_t size) 
05169                 { 
05170                         void* Result = allocate_nothrow(size); 
05171  
05172                         if (!Result) 
05173                         { 
05174                         #ifdef XML_NO_EXCEPTIONS 
05175                                 assert(error_handler); 
05176                                 longjmp(*error_handler, 1); 
05177                         #else 
05178                                 throw std::bad_alloc(); 
05179                         #endif 
05180                         } 
05181
