06973                                         double l = convert_Stringo_number(string_Value(*li, stack.Result).c_str()); 
06974  
06975                                         for (const XPathNode* ri = rs.begin(); ri != rs.end(); ++ri) 
06976                                         { 
06977                                                 XPathAllocatorCapture crii(stack.Result); 
06978  
06979                                                 if (comp(l, convert_Stringo_number(string_Value(*ri, stack.Result).c_str()))) 
06980                                                         return true; 
06981                                         } 
06982                                 } 
06983  
06984                                 return false; 
06985                         } 
06986                         else if (lt != XPathTypeNodeSet && rt == XPathTypeNodeSet) 
06987                         { 
06988                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
06989  
06990                                 double l = lhs->eval_number(c, stack); 
06991                                 XPathNodeSet_raw rs = rhs->eval_NodeSet(c, stack); 
06992  
06993                                 for (const XPathNode* ri = rs.begin(); ri != rs.end(); ++ri) 
06994                                 { 
06995                                         XPathAllocatorCapture cri(stack.Result); 
06996  
06997                                         if (comp(l, convert_Stringo_number(string_Value(*ri, stack.Result).c_str()))) 
06998                                                 return true; 
06999                                 } 
07000  
07001                                 return false; 
07002                         } 
07003                         else if (lt == XPathTypeNodeSet && rt != XPathTypeNodeSet) 
07004                         { 
07005                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
07006  
07007                                 XPathNodeSet_raw ls = lhs->eval_NodeSet(c, stack); 
07008                                 double r = rhs->eval_number(c, stack); 
07009  
07010                                 for (const XPathNode* li = ls.begin(); li != ls.end(); ++li) 
07011                                 { 
07012                                         XPathAllocatorCapture cri(stack.Result); 
07013  
07014                                         if (comp(convert_Stringo_number(string_Value(*li, stack.Result).c_str()), r)) 
07015                                                 return true; 
07016                                 } 
07017  
07018                                 return false; 
07019                         } 
07020                         else 
07021                         { 
07022                                 assert(!"Wrong Types"); 
07023                                 return false; 
07024                         } 
07025                 } 
07026  
07027                 void apply_predicate(XPathNodeSet_raw& ns, size_t first, XPathAstNode* expr, const XPathStack& stack) 
07028                 { 
07029                         assert(ns.size() >= first); 
07030  
07031                         size_t i = 1; 
07032                         size_t size = ns.size() - first; 
07033                                  
07034                         XPathNode* last = ns.begin() + first; 
07035                                  
07036                         // RemoveIf... or well, sort of 
07037                         for (XPathNode* it = last; it != ns.end(); ++it, ++i) 
07038                         { 
07039                                 XPathContext c(*it, i, size); 
07040                          
07041                                 if (expr->retType() == XPathTypeNumber) 
07042                                 { 
07043                                         if (expr->eval_number(c, stack) == i) 
07044                                                 *last++ = *it; 
07045                                 } 
07046                                 else if (expr->eval_boolean(c, stack)) 
07047                                         *last++ = *it; 
07048                         } 
07049                          
07050                         ns.truncate(last); 
07051                 } 
07052  
07053                 void apply_predicates(XPathNodeSet_raw& ns, size_t first, const XPathStack& stack) 
07054                 { 
07055                         if (ns.size() == first) return; 
07056                          
07057                         for (XPathAstNode* pred = _right; pred; pred = pred->_next) 
07058                         { 
07059                                 apply_predicate(ns, first, pred->_left, stack); 
07060                         } 
07061                 } 
07062  
07063                 void step_push(XPathNodeSet_raw& ns, const Attribute& a, const Node& GetParent, XPathAllocator* alloc) 
07064                 { 
07065                         if (!a) return; 
07066  
07067                         const char_t* Name = a.Name(); 
07068  
07069                         // There are no GetAttribute nodes corresponding to attributes that declare namespaces 
07070                         // That is, "xmlns:..." or "xmlns" 
07071                         if (starts_with(Name, XML_TEXT("xmlns")) && (Name[5] == 0 || Name[5] == ':')) return; 
07072                          
07073                         switch (_test) 
07074                         { 
07075                         case nodetest_Name: 
07076                                 if (strequal(Name, _data.nodetest)) ns.push_back(XPathNode(a, GetParent), alloc); 
07077                                 break; 
07078                                  
07079                         case nodetest_type_node: 
07080                         case nodetest_all: 
07081                                 ns.push_back(XPathNode(a, GetParent), alloc); 
07082                                 break; 
07083                                  
07084                         case nodetest_all_in_namespace: 
07085                                 if (starts_with(Name, _data.nodetest)) 
07086                                         ns.push_back(XPathNode(a, GetParent), alloc); 
07087                                 break; 
07088                          
07089                         default: 
07090                                 ; 
07091                         } 
07092                 } 
07093                  
07094                 void step_push(XPathNodeSet_raw& ns, const Node& n, XPathAllocator* alloc) 
07095                 { 
07096                         if (!n) return; 
07097  
07098                         switch (_test) 
07099                         { 
07100                         case nodetest_Name: 
07101                                 if (n.Type() == NodeElement && strequal(n.Name(), _data.nodetest)) ns.push_back(n, alloc); 
07102                                 break; 
07103                                  
07104                         case nodetest_type_node: 
07105                                 ns.push_back(n, alloc); 
07106                                 break; 
07107                                  
07108                         case nodetest_type_comment: 
07109                                 if (n.Type() == NodeComment) 
07110                                         ns.push_back(n, alloc); 
07111                                 break; 
07112                                  
07113                         case nodetest_type_text: 
07114                                 if (n.Type() == NodePcdata || n.Type() == NodeCdata) 
07115                                         ns.push_back(n, alloc); 
07116                                 break; 
07117                                  
07118                         case nodetest_type_pi: 
07119                                 if (n.Type() == NodePi) 
07120                                         ns.push_back(n, alloc); 
07121                                 break; 
07122                                                                          
07123                         case nodetest_pi: 
07124                                 if (n.Type() == NodePi && strequal(n.Name(), _data.nodetest)) 
07125                                         ns.push_back(n, alloc); 
07126                                 break; 
07127                                  
07128                         case nodetest_all: 
07129                                 if (n.Type() == NodeElement) 
07130                                         ns.push_back(n, alloc); 
07131                                 break; 
07132                                  
07133                         case nodetest_all_in_namespace: 
07134                                 if (n.Type() == NodeElement && starts_with(n.Name(), _data.nodetest)) 
07135                                         ns.push_back(n, alloc); 
07136                                 break; 
07137  
07138                         default: 
07139                                 assert(!"Unknown axis"); 
07140                         }  
07141                 } 
07142  
07143                 template <class T> void step_fill(XPathNodeSet_raw& ns, const Node& n, XPathAllocator* alloc, T) 
07144                 { 
07145                         const axis_t axis = T::axis; 
07146  
07147                         switch (axis) 
07148                         { 
07149                         case axis_attribute: 
07150                         { 
07151                                 for (Attribute a = n.GetFirstAttribute(); a; a = a.GetNextAttribute()) 
07152                                         step_push(ns, a, n, alloc); 
07153                                  
07154                                 break; 
07155                         } 
07156                          
07157                         case axis_GetChild: 
07158                         { 
07159                                 for (Node c = n.GetFirstChild(); c; c = c.GetNextSibling()) 
07160                                         step_push(ns, c, alloc); 
07161                                          
07162                                 break; 
07163                         } 
07164                          
07165                         case axis_descendant: 
07166                         case axis_descendant_or_self: 
07167                         { 
07168                                 if (axis == axis_descendant_or_self) 
07169                                         step_push(ns, n, alloc); 
07170                                          
07171                                 Node cur = n.GetFirstChild(); 
07172                                  
07173                                 while (cur && cur != n) 
07174                                 { 
07175                                         step_push(ns, cur, alloc); 
07176                                          
07177                                         if (cur.GetFirstChild()) 
07178                                                 cur = cur.GetFirstChild(); 
07179                                         else if (cur.GetNextSibling()) 
07180                                                 cur = cur.GetNextSibling(); 
07181                                         else 
07182                                         { 
07183                                                 while (!cur.GetNextSibling() && cur != n) 
07184                                                         cur = cur.GetParent(); 
07185                                          
07186                                                 if (cur != n) cur = cur.GetNextSibling(); 
07187                                         } 
07188                                 } 
07189                                  
07190                                 break; 
07191                         } 
07192                          
07193                         case axis_following_sibling: 
07194                         { 
07195                                 for (Node c = n.GetNextSibling(); c; c = c.GetNextSibling()) 
07196                                         step_push(ns, c, alloc); 
07197                                  
07198                                 break; 
07199                         } 
07200                          
07201                         case axis_preceding_sibling: 
07202                         { 
07203                                 for (Node c = n.GetPreviousSibling(); c; c = c.GetPreviousSibling()) 
07204                                         step_push(ns, c, alloc); 
07205                                  
07206                                 break; 
07207                         } 
07208                          
07209                         case axis_following: 
07210                         { 
07211                                 Node cur = n; 
07212  
07213                                 // exit from this node so that we don't include descendants 
07214                                 while (cur && !cur.GetNextSibling()) cur = cur.GetParent(); 
07215                                 cur = cur.GetNextSibling(); 
07216  
07217                                 for (;;) 
07218                                 { 
07219                                         step_push(ns, cur, alloc); 
07220  
07221                                         if (cur.GetFirstChild()) 
07222                                                 cur = cur.GetFirstChild(); 
07223                                         else if (cur.GetNextSibling()) 
07224                                                 cur = cur.GetNextSibling(); 
07225                                         else 
07226                                         { 
07227                                                 while (cur && !cur.GetNextSibling()) cur = cur.GetParent(); 
07228                                                 cur = cur.GetNextSibling(); 
07229  
07230                                                 if (!cur) break; 
07231                                         } 
07232                                 } 
07233  
07234                                 break; 
07235                         } 
07236  
07237                         case axis_preceding: 
07238                         { 
07239                                 Node cur = n; 
07240  
07241                                 while (cur && !cur.GetPreviousSibling()) cur = cur.GetParent(); 
07242                                 cur = cur.GetPreviousSibling(); 
07243  
07244                                 for (;;) 
07245                                 { 
07246                                         if (cur.GetLastChild()) 
07247                                                 cur = cur.GetLastChild(); 
07248                                         else 
07249                                         { 
07250                                                 // leaf node, can't be ancestor 
07251                                                 step_push(ns, cur, alloc); 
07252  
07253                                                 if (cur.GetPreviousSibling()) 
07254                                                         cur = cur.GetPreviousSibling(); 
07255                                                 else 
07256                                                 { 
07257                                                         do  
07258                                                         { 
07259                                                                 cur = cur.GetParent(); 
07260                                                                 if (!cur) break; 
07261  
07262                                                                 if (!NodeIs_ancestor(cur, n)) step_push(ns, cur, alloc); 
07263                                                         } 
07264                                                         while (!cur.GetPreviousSibling()); 
07265  
07266                                                         cur = cur.GetPreviousSibling(); 
07267  
07268                                                         if (!cur) break; 
07269                                                 } 
07270                                         } 
07271                                 } 
07272  
07273                                 break; 
07274                         } 
07275                          
07276                         case axis_ancestor: 
07277                         case axis_ancestor_or_self: 
07278                         { 
07279                                 if (axis == axis_ancestor_or_self) 
07280                                         step_push(ns, n, alloc); 
07281  
07282                                 Node cur = n.GetParent(); 
07283                                  
07284                                 while (cur) 
07285                                 { 
07286                                         step_push(ns, cur, alloc); 
07287                                          
07288                                         cur = cur.GetParent(); 
07289                                 } 
07290                                  
07291                                 break; 
07292                         } 
07293  
07294                         case axis_self: 
07295                         { 
07296                                 step_push(ns, n, alloc); 
07297  
07298                                 break; 
07299                         } 
07300  
07301                         case axis_GetParent: 
07302                         { 
07303                                 if (n.GetParent()) step_push(ns, n.GetParent(), alloc); 
07304  
07305                                 break; 
07306                         } 
07307                                  
07308                         default: 
07309                                 assert(!"Unimplemented axis"); 
07310                         } 
07311                 } 
07312                  
07313                 template <class T> void step_fill(XPathNodeSet_raw& ns, const Attribute& a, const Node& p, XPathAllocator* alloc, T v) 
07314                 { 
07315                         const axis_t axis = T::axis; 
07316  
07317                         switch (axis) 
07318                         { 
07319                         case axis_ancestor: 
07320                         case axis_ancestor_or_self: 
07321                         { 
07322                                 if (axis == axis_ancestor_or_self && _test == nodetest_type_node) // reject attributes based on principal node Type test 
07323                                         step_push(ns, a, p, alloc); 
07324  
07325                                 Node cur = p; 
07326                                  
07327                                 while (cur) 
07328                                 { 
07329                                         step_push(ns, cur, alloc); 
07330                                          
07331                                         cur = cur.GetParent(); 
07332                                 } 
07333                                  
07334                                 break; 
07335                         } 
07336  
07337                         case axis_descendant_or_self: 
07338                         case axis_self: 
07339                         { 
07340                                 if (_test == nodetest_type_node) // reject attributes based on principal node Type test 
07341                                         step_push(ns, a, p, alloc); 
07342  
07343                                 break; 
07344                         } 
07345  
07346                         case axis_following: 
07347                         { 
07348                                 Node cur = p; 
07349                                  
07350                                 for (;;) 
07351                                 { 
07352                                         if (cur.GetFirstChild()) 
07353                                                 cur = cur.GetFirstChild(); 
07354                                         else if (cur.GetNextSibling()) 
07355                                                 cur = cur.GetNextSibling(); 
07356                                         else 
07357                                         { 
07358                                                 while (cur && !cur.GetNextSibling()) cur = cur.GetParent(); 
07359                                                 cur = cur.GetNextSibling(); 
07360                                                  
07361                                                 if (!cur) break; 
07362                                         } 
07363  
07364                                         step_push(ns, cur, alloc); 
07365                                 } 
07366  
07367                                 break; 
07368                         } 
07369  
07370                         case axis_GetParent: 
07371                         { 
07372                                 step_push(ns, p, alloc); 
07373  
07374                                 break; 
07375                         } 
07376  
07377                         case axis_preceding: 
07378                         { 
07379                                 // preceding:: axis does not include GetAttribute nodes and GetAttribute ancestors (they are the same as GetParent's ancestors), so we can reuse node preceding 
07380                                 step_fill(ns, p, alloc, v); 
07381                                 break; 
07382                         } 
07383                          
07384                         default: 
07385                                 assert(!"Unimplemented axis"); 
07386                         } 
07387                 } 
07388                  
07389                 template <class T> XPathNodeSet_raw step_do(const XPathContext& c, const XPathStack& stack, T v) 
07390                 { 
07391                         const axis_t axis = T::axis; 
07392                         bool attributes = (axis == axis_ancestor || axis == axis_ancestor_or_self || axis == axis_descendant_or_self || axis == axis_following || axis == axis_GetParent || axis == axis_preceding || axis == axis_self); 
07393  
07394                         XPathNodeSet_raw ns; 
07395                         ns.SetType((axis == axis_ancestor || axis == axis_ancestor_or_self || axis == axis_preceding || axis == axis_preceding_sibling) ? XPathNodeSet::TypeSortedReverse : XPathNodeSet::TypeSorted); 
07396  
07397                         if (_left) 
07398                         { 
07399                                 XPathNodeSet_raw s = _left->eval_NodeSet(c, stack); 
07400  
07401                                 // self axis preserves the original order 
07402                                 if (axis == axis_self) ns.SetType(s.Type()); 
07403  
07404                                 for (const XPathNode* it = s.begin(); it != s.end(); ++it) 
07405                                 { 
07406                                         size_t size = ns.size(); 
07407  
07408                                         // in general, all axes generate elements in a particular order, but there is no order guarantee if axis is applied to two nodes 
07409                                         if (axis != axis_self && size != 0) ns.SetType(XPathNodeSet::TypeUnsorted); 
07410                                          
07411                                         if (it->GetNode()) 
07412                                                 step_fill(ns, it->GetNode(), stack.Result, v); 
07413                                         else if (attributes) 
07414                                                 step_fill(ns, it->GetAttribute(), it->GetParent(), stack.Result, v); 
07415                                                  
07416                                         apply_predicates(ns, size, stack); 
07417                                 } 
07418                         } 
07419                         else 
07420                         { 
07421                                 if (c.n.GetNode()) 
07422                                         step_fill(ns, c.n.GetNode(), stack.Result, v); 
07423                                 else if (attributes) 
07424                                         step_fill(ns, c.n.GetAttribute(), c.n.GetParent(), stack.Result, v); 
07425                                  
07426                                 apply_predicates(ns, 0, stack); 
07427                         } 
07428  
07429                         // GetChild, GetAttribute and self axes always generate unique set of nodes 
07430                         // for other axis, if the set stayed sorted, it stayed unique because the traversal algorithms do not visit the same node twice 
07431                         if (axis != axis_GetChild && axis != axis_attribute && axis != axis_self && ns.Type() == XPathNodeSet::TypeUnsorted) 
07432                                 ns.RemoveDuplicates(); 
07433  
07434                         return ns; 
07435                 } 
07436                  
07437         public: 
07438                 XPathAstNode(ast_type_t Type, XPathValueType retType, const char_t* Value): 
07439                         _type((char)Type), _retType((char)retType), _axis(0), _test(0), _left(0), _right(0), _next(0) 
07440                 { 
07441                         assert(Type == ast_string_constant); 
07442                         _data.string = Value; 
07443                 } 
07444  
07445                 XPathAstNode(ast_type_t Type, XPathValueType retType, double Value): 
07446                         _type((char)Type), _retType((char)retType), _axis(0), _test(0), _left(0), _right(0), _next(0) 
07447                 { 
07448                         assert(Type == ast_number_constant); 
07449                         _data.number = Value; 
07450                 } 
07451                  
07452                 XPathAstNode(ast_type_t Type, XPathValueType retType, XPathVariable* Value): 
07453                         _type((char)Type), _retType((char)retType), _axis(0), _test(0), _left(0), _right(0), _next(0) 
07454                 { 
07455                         assert(Type == ast_variable); 
07456                         _data.variable = Value; 
07457                 } 
07458                  
07459                 XPathAstNode(ast_type_t Type, XPathValueType retType, XPathAstNode* left = 0, XPathAstNode* right = 0): 
07460                         _type((char)Type), _retType((char)retType), _axis(0), _test(0), _left(left), _right(right), _next(0) 
07461                 { 
07462                 } 
07463  
07464                 XPathAstNode(ast_type_t Type, XPathAstNode* left, axis_t axis, nodetest_t test, const char_t* contents): 
07465                         _type((char)Type), _retType(XPathTypeNodeSet), _axis((char)axis), _test((char)test), _left(left), _right(0), _next(0) 
07466                 { 
07467                         _data.nodetest = contents; 
07468                 } 
07469  
07470                 void SetNext(XPathAstNode* Value) 
07471                 { 
07472                         _next = Value; 
07473                 } 
07474  
07475                 void SetRight(XPathAstNode* Value) 
07476                 { 
07477                         _right = Value; 
07478                 } 
07479  
07480                 bool eval_boolean(const XPathContext& c, const XPathStack& stack) 
07481                 { 
07482                         switch (_type) 
07483                         { 
07484                         case ast_op_or: 
07485                                 return _left->eval_boolean(c, stack) || _right->eval_boolean(c, stack); 
07486                                  
07487                         case ast_op_and: 
07488                                 return _left->eval_boolean(c, stack) && _right->eval_boolean(c, stack); 
07489                                  
07490                         case ast_op_equal: 
07491                                 return compare_eq(_left, _right, c, stack, equal_to()); 
07492  
07493                         case ast_op_not_equal: 
07494                                 return compare_eq(_left, _right, c, stack, not_equal_to()); 
07495          
07496                         case ast_op_less: 
07497                                 return compare_rel(_left, _right, c, stack, less()); 
07498                          
07499                         case ast_op_greater: 
07500                                 return compare_rel(_right, _left, c, stack, less()); 
07501  
07502                         case ast_op_less_or_equal: 
07503                                 return compare_rel(_left, _right, c, stack, less_equal()); 
07504                          
07505                         case ast_op_greater_or_equal: 
07506                                 return compare_rel(_right, _left, c, stack, less_equal()); 
07507  
07508                         case ast_func_starts_with: 
07509                         { 
07510                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
07511  
07512                                 XPathString lr = _left->eval_string(c, stack); 
07513                                 XPathString rr = _right->eval_string(c, stack); 
07514  
07515                                 return starts_with(lr.c_str(), rr.c_str()); 
07516                         } 
07517  
07518                         case ast_func_contains: 
07519                         { 
07520                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
07521  
07522                                 XPathString lr = _left->eval_string(c, stack); 
07523                                 XPathString rr = _right->eval_string(c, stack); 
07524  
07525                                 return FindSubstring(lr.c_str(), rr.c_str()) != 0; 
07526                         } 
07527  
07528                         case ast_func_boolean: 
07529                                 return _left->eval_boolean(c, stack); 
07530                                  
07531                         case ast_func_not: 
07532                                 return !_left->eval_boolean(c, stack); 
07533                                  
07534                         case ast_func_true: 
07535                                 return true; 
07536                                  
07537                         case ast_func_false: 
07538                                 return false; 
07539  
07540                         case ast_func_lang: 
07541                         { 
07542                                 if (c.n.GetAttribute()) return false; 
07543                                  
07544                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
07545  
07546                                 XPathString lang = _left->eval_string(c, stack); 
07547                                  
07548                                 for (Node n = c.n.GetNode(); n; n = n.GetParent()) 
07549                                 { 
07550                                         Attribute a = n.GetAttribute(XML_TEXT("xml:lang")); 
07551                                          
07552                                         if (a) 
07553                                         { 
07554                                                 const char_t* Value = a.Value(); 
07555                                                  
07556                                                 // strnicmp / strncasecmp is not portable 
07557                                                 for (const char_t* lit = lang.c_str(); *lit; ++lit) 
07558                                                 { 
07559                                                         if (tolower_ascii(*lit) != tolower_ascii(*Value)) return false; 
07560                                                         ++Value; 
07561                                                 } 
07562                                                  
07563                                                 return *Value == 0 || *Value == '-'; 
07564                                         } 
07565                                 } 
07566                                  
07567                                 return false; 
07568                         } 
07569  
07570                         case ast_variable: 
07571                         { 
07572                                 assert(_retType == _data.variable->Type()); 
07573  
07574                                 if (_retType == XPathTypeBoolean) 
07575                                         return _data.variable->GetBoolean(); 
07576  
07577                                 // fallthrough to Type conversion 
07578                         } 
07579  
07580                         default: 
07581                         { 
07582                                 switch (_retType) 
07583                                 { 
07584                                 case XPathTypeNumber: 
07585                                         return convert_number_to_boolean(eval_number(c, stack)); 
07586                                          
07587                                 case XPathTypeString: 
07588                                 { 
07589                                         XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
07590  
07591                                         return !eval_string(c, stack).Empty(); 
07592                                 } 
07593                                          
07594                                 case XPathTypeNodeSet:                           
07595                                 { 
07596                                         XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
07597  
07598                                         return !eval_NodeSet(c, stack).Empty(); 
07599                                 } 
07600  
07601                                 default: 
07602                                         assert(!"Wrong expression for return Type boolean"); 
07603                                         return false; 
07604                                 } 
07605                         } 
07606                         } 
07607                 } 
07608  
07609                 double eval_number(const XPathContext& c, const XPathStack& stack) 
07610                 { 
07611                         switch (_type) 
07612                         { 
07613                         case ast_op_add: 
07614                                 return _left->eval_number(c, stack) + _right->eval_number(c, stack); 
07615                                  
07616                         case ast_op_subtract: 
07617                                 return _left->eval_number(c, stack) - _right->eval_number(c, stack); 
07618  
07619                         case ast_op_multiply: 
07620                                 return _left->eval_number(c, stack) * _right->eval_number(c, stack); 
07621  
07622                         case ast_op_divide: 
07623                                 return _left->eval_number(c, stack) / _right->eval_number(c, stack); 
07624  
07625                         case ast_op_mod: 
07626                                 return fmod(_left->eval_number(c, stack), _right->eval_number(c, stack)); 
07627  
07628                         case ast_op_negate: 
07629                                 return -_left->eval_number(c, stack); 
07630  
07631                         case ast_number_constant: 
07632                                 return _data.number; 
07633  
07634                         case ast_func_last: 
07635                                 return (double)c.size; 
07636                          
07637                         case ast_func_position: 
07638                                 return (double)c.position; 
07639  
07640                         case ast_func_count: 
07641                         { 
07642                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
07643  
07644                                 return (double)_left->eval_NodeSet(c, stack).size(); 
07645                         } 
07646                          
07647                         case ast_func_string_length_0: 
07648                         { 
07649                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
07650  
07651                                 return (double)string_Value(c.n, stack.Result).length(); 
07652                         } 
07653                          
07654                         case ast_func_string_length_1: 
07655                         { 
07656                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
07657  
07658                                 return (double)_left->eval_string(c, stack).length(); 
07659                         } 
07660                          
07661                         case ast_func_number_0: 
07662                         { 
07663                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
07664  
07665                                 return convert_Stringo_number(string_Value(c.n, stack.Result).c_str()); 
07666                         } 
07667                          
07668                         case ast_func_number_1: 
07669                                 return _left->eval_number(c, stack); 
07670  
07671                         case ast_func_sum: 
07672                         { 
07673                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
07674  
07675                                 double r = 0; 
07676                                  
07677                                 XPathNodeSet_raw ns = _left->eval_NodeSet(c, stack); 
07678                                  
07679                                 for (const XPathNode* it = ns.begin(); it != ns.end(); ++it) 
07680                                 { 
07681                                         XPathAllocatorCapture cri(stack.Result); 
07682  
07683                                         r += convert_Stringo_number(string_Value(*it, stack.Result).c_str()); 
07684                                 } 
07685                          
07686                                 return r; 
07687                         } 
07688  
07689                         case ast_func_floor: 
07690                         { 
07691                                 double r = _left->eval_number(c, stack); 
07692                                  
07693                                 return r == r ? floor(r) : r; 
07694                         } 
07695  
07696                         case ast_func_ceiling: 
07697                         { 
07698                                 double r = _left->eval_number(c, stack); 
07699                                  
07700                                 return r == r ? ceil(r) : r; 
07701                         } 
07702  
07703                         case ast_func_round: 
07704                                 return round_nearest_nzero(_left->eval_number(c, stack)); 
07705                          
07706                         case ast_variable: 
07707                         { 
07708                                 assert(_retType == _data.variable->Type()); 
07709  
07710                                 if (_retType == XPathTypeNumber) 
07711                                         return _data.variable->GetNumber(); 
07712  
07713                                 // fallthrough to Type conversion 
07714                         } 
07715  
07716                         default: 
07717                         { 
07718                                 switch (_retType) 
07719                                 { 
07720                                 case XPathTypeBoolean: 
07721                                         return eval_boolean(c, stack) ? 1 : 0; 
07722                                          
07723                                 case XPathTypeString: 
07724                                 { 
07725                                         XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
07726  
07727                                         return convert_Stringo_number(eval_string(c, stack).c_str()); 
07728                                 } 
07729                                          
07730                                 case XPathTypeNodeSet: 
07731                                 { 
07732                                         XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
07733  
07734                                         return convert_Stringo_number(eval_string(c, stack).c_str()); 
07735                                 } 
07736                                          
07737                                 default: 
07738                                         assert(!"Wrong expression for return Type number"); 
07739                                         return 0; 
07740                                 } 
07741                                  
07742                         } 
07743                         } 
07744                 } 
07745                  
07746                 XPathString eval_string_concat(const XPathContext& c, const XPathStack& stack) 
07747                 { 
07748                         assert(_type == ast_func_concat); 
07749  
07750                         XPathAllocatorCapture ct(stack.temp); 
07751  
07752                         // count the string number 
07753                         size_t count = 1; 
07754                         for (XPathAstNode* nc = _right; nc; nc = nc->_next) count++; 
07755  
07756                         // gather all strings 
07757                         XPathString static_buffer[4]; 
07758                         XPathString* buffer = static_buffer; 
07759  
07760                         // allocate on-heap for large concats 
07761                         if (count > sizeof(static_buffer) / sizeof(static_buffer[0])) 
07762                         { 
07763                                 buffer = static_cast<XPathString*>(stack.temp->allocate(count * sizeof(XPathString))); 
07764                                 assert(buffer); 
07765                         } 
07766  
07767                         // evaluate all strings to temporary stack 
07768                         XPathStack swapped_stack = {stack.temp, stack.Result}; 
07769  
07770                         buffer[0] = _left->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07771  
07772                         size_t pos = 1; 
07773                         for (XPathAstNode* n = _right; n; n = n->_next, ++pos) buffer[pos] = n->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07774                         assert(pos == count); 
07775  
07776                         // get total length 
07777                         size_t length = 0; 
07778                         for (size_t i = 0; i < count; ++i) length += buffer[i].length(); 
07779  
07780                         // create final string 
07781                         char_t* Result = static_cast<char_t*>(stack.Result->allocate((length + 1) * sizeof(char_t))); 
07782                         assert(Result); 
07783  
07784                         char_t* ri = Result; 
07785  
07786                         for (size_t j = 0; j < count; ++j) 
07787                                 for (const char_t* bi = buffer[j].c_str(); *bi; ++bi) 
07788                                         *ri++ = *bi; 
07789  
07790                         *ri = 0; 
07791  
07792                         return XPathString(Result, true); 
07793                 } 
07794  
07795                 XPathString eval_string(const XPathContext& c, const XPathStack& stack) 
07796                 { 
07797                         switch (_type) 
07798                         { 
07799                         case ast_string_constant: 
07800                                 return XPathStringConst(_data.string); 
07801                          
07802                         case ast_func_local_Name_0: 
07803                         { 
07804                                 XPathNode na = c.n; 
07805                                  
07806                                 return XPathStringConst(local_Name(na)); 
07807                         } 
07808  
07809                         case ast_func_local_Name_1: 
07810                         { 
07811                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
07812  
07813                                 XPathNodeSet_raw ns = _left->eval_NodeSet(c, stack); 
07814                                 XPathNode na = ns.first(); 
07815                                  
07816                                 return XPathStringConst(local_Name(na)); 
07817                         } 
07818  
07819                         case ast_func_Name_0: 
07820                         { 
07821                                 XPathNode na = c.n; 
07822                                  
07823                                 return XPathStringConst(qualified_Name(na)); 
07824                         } 
07825  
07826                         case ast_func_Name_1: 
07827                         { 
07828                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
07829  
07830                                 XPathNodeSet_raw ns = _left->eval_NodeSet(c, stack); 
07831                                 XPathNode na = ns.first(); 
07832                                  
07833                                 return XPathStringConst(qualified_Name(na)); 
07834                         } 
07835  
07836                         case ast_func_namespace_uri_0: 
07837                         { 
07838                                 XPathNode na = c.n; 
07839                                  
07840                                 return XPathStringConst(namespace_uri(na)); 
07841                         } 
07842  
07843                         case ast_func_namespace_uri_1: 
07844                         { 
07845                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.Result); 
07846  
07847                                 XPathNodeSet_raw ns = _left->eval_NodeSet(c, stack); 
07848                                 XPathNode na = ns.first(); 
07849                                  
07850                                 return XPathStringConst(namespace_uri(na)); 
07851                         } 
07852  
07853                         case ast_func_string_0: 
07854                                 return string_Value(c.n, stack.Result); 
07855  
07856                         case ast_func_string_1: 
07857                                 return _left->eval_string(c, stack); 
07858  
07859                         case ast_func_concat: 
07860                                 return eval_string_concat(c, stack); 
07861  
07862                         case ast_func_substring_before: 
07863                         { 
07864                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.temp); 
07865  
07866                                 XPathStack swapped_stack = {stack.temp, stack.Result}; 
07867  
07868                                 XPathString s = _left->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07869                                 XPathString p = _right->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07870  
07871                                 const char_t* pos = FindSubstring(s.c_str(), p.c_str()); 
07872                                  
07873                                 return pos ? XPathString(s.c_str(), pos, stack.Result) : XPathString(); 
07874                         } 
07875                          
07876                         case ast_func_substring_after: 
07877                         { 
07878                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.temp); 
07879  
07880                                 XPathStack swapped_stack = {stack.temp, stack.Result}; 
07881  
07882                                 XPathString s = _left->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07883                                 XPathString p = _right->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07884                                  
07885                                 const char_t* pos = FindSubstring(s.c_str(), p.c_str()); 
07886                                 if (!pos) return XPathString(); 
07887  
07888                                 const char_t* Result = pos + p.length(); 
07889  
07890                                 return s.uses_heap() ? XPathString(Result, stack.Result) : XPathStringConst(Result); 
07891                         } 
07892  
07893                         case ast_func_substring_2: 
07894                         { 
07895                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.temp); 
07896  
07897                                 XPathStack swapped_stack = {stack.temp, stack.Result}; 
07898  
07899                                 XPathString s = _left->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07900                                 size_t s_length = s.length(); 
07901  
07902                                 double first = round_nearest(_right->eval_number(c, stack)); 
07903                                  
07904                                 if (is_nan(first)) return XPathString(); // NaN 
07905                                 else if (first >= s_length + 1) return XPathString(); 
07906                                  
07907                                 size_t pos = first < 1 ? 1 : (size_t)first; 
07908                                 assert(1 <= pos && pos <= s_length + 1); 
07909  
07910                                 const char_t* rbegin = s.c_str() + (pos - 1); 
07911                                  
07912                                 return s.uses_heap() ? XPathString(rbegin, stack.Result) : XPathStringConst(rbegin); 
07913                         } 
07914                          
07915                         case ast_func_substring_3: 
07916                         { 
07917                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.temp); 
07918  
07919                                 XPathStack swapped_stack = {stack.temp, stack.Result}; 
07920  
07921                                 XPathString s = _left->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07922                                 size_t s_length = s.length(); 
07923  
07924                                 double first = round_nearest(_right->eval_number(c, stack)); 
07925                                 double last = first + round_nearest(_right->_next->eval_number(c, stack)); 
07926                                  
07927                                 if (is_nan(first) || is_nan(last)) return XPathString(); 
07928                                 else if (first >= s_length + 1) return XPathString(); 
07929                                 else if (first >= last) return XPathString(); 
07930                                 else if (last < 1) return XPathString(); 
07931                                  
07932                                 size_t pos = first < 1 ? 1 : (size_t)first; 
07933                                 size_t end = last >= s_length + 1 ? s_length + 1 : (size_t)last; 
07934  
07935                                 assert(1 <= pos && pos <= end && end <= s_length + 1); 
07936                                 const char_t* rbegin = s.c_str() + (pos - 1); 
07937                                 const char_t* rend = s.c_str() + (end - 1); 
07938  
07939                                 return (end == s_length + 1 && !s.uses_heap()) ? XPathStringConst(rbegin) : XPathString(rbegin, rend, stack.Result); 
07940                         } 
07941  
07942                         case ast_func_normalize_space_0: 
07943                         { 
07944                                 XPathString s = string_Value(c.n, stack.Result); 
07945  
07946                                 normalize_space(s.data(stack.Result)); 
07947  
07948                                 return s; 
07949                         } 
07950  
07951                         case ast_func_normalize_space_1: 
07952                         { 
07953                                 XPathString s = _left->eval_string(c, stack); 
07954  
07955                                 normalize_space(s.data(stack.Result)); 
07956                          
07957                                 return s; 
07958                         } 
07959  
07960                         case ast_func_translate: 
07961                         { 
07962                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.temp); 
07963  
07964                                 XPathStack swapped_stack = {stack.temp, stack.Result}; 
07965  
07966                                 XPathString s = _left->eval_string(c, stack); 
07967                                 XPathString from = _right->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07968                                 XPathString to = _right->_next->eval_string(c, swapped_stack); 
07969  
07970                                 translate(s.data(stack.Result), from.c_str(), to.c_str()); 
07971  
07972                                 return s; 
07973                         } 
07974  
07975                         case ast_variable: 
07976                         { 
07977                                 assert(_retType == _data.variable->Type()); 
07978  
07979                                 if (_retType == XPathTypeString) 
07980                                         return XPathStringConst(_data.variable->GetString()); 
07981  
07982                                 // fallthrough to Type conversion 
07983                         } 
07984  
07985                         default: 
07986                         { 
07987                                 switch (_retType) 
07988                                 { 
07989                                 case XPathTypeBoolean: 
07990                                         return XPathStringConst(eval_boolean(c, stack) ? XML_TEXT("true") : XML_TEXT("false")); 
07991                                          
07992                                 case XPathTypeNumber: 
07993                                         return convert_number_to_string(eval_number(c, stack), stack.Result); 
07994                                          
07995                                 case XPathTypeNodeSet: 
07996                                 { 
07997                                         XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.temp); 
07998  
07999                                         XPathStack swapped_stack = {stack.temp, stack.Result}; 
08000  
08001                                         XPathNodeSet_raw ns = eval_NodeSet(c, swapped_stack); 
08002                                         return ns.Empty() ? XPathString() : string_Value(ns.first(), stack.Result); 
08003                                 } 
08004                                  
08005                                 default: 
08006                                         assert(!"Wrong expression for return Type string"); 
08007                                         return XPathString(); 
08008                                 } 
08009                         } 
08010                         } 
08011                 } 
08012  
08013                 XPathNodeSet_raw eval_NodeSet(const XPathContext& c, const XPathStack& stack) 
08014                 { 
08015                         switch (_type) 
08016                         { 
08017                         case ast_op_union: 
08018                         { 
08019                                 XPathAllocatorCapture cr(stack.temp); 
08020  
08021                                 XPathStack swapped_stack = {stack.temp, stack.Result}; 
08022  
08023                                 XPathNodeSet_raw ls = _left->eval_NodeSet(c, swapped_stack); 
08024                                 XPathNodeSet_raw rs = _right->eval_NodeSet(c, stack); 
08025                                  
08026                                 // we can optimize merging two sorted sets, but this is a very rare operation, so don't bother 
08027                                 rs.SetType(XPathNodeSet::TypeUnsorted); 
08028  
08029                                 rs.append(ls.begin(), ls.end(), stack.Result); 
08030                                 rs.RemoveDuplicates(); 
08031                                  
08032                                 return rs; 
08033                         } 
08034  
08035                         case ast_filter: 
08036                         case ast_filter_posinv: 
08037                         { 
08038                                 XPathNodeSet_raw set = _left->eval_NodeSet(c, stack); 
08039  
08040                                 // either expression is a number or it contains position() call; sort by document order 
08041                                 if (_type == ast_filter) set.sort_do(); 
08042  
08043                                 apply_predicate(set, 0, _right, stack); 
08044                          
08045                                 return set; 
08046                         } 
08047                          
08048                         case ast_func_id: 
08049                                 return XPathNodeSet_raw(); 
08050                          
08051                         case ast_step: 
08052                         { 
08053                                 switch (_axis) 
08054                                 { 
08055                                 case axis_ancestor: 
08056                                         return step_do(c, stack, axis_to_type<axis_ancestor>()); 
08057                                          
08058                                 case axis_ancestor_or_self: 
08059                                         return step_do(c, stack, axis_to_type<axis_ancestor_or_self>()); 
08060  
08061                                 case axis_attribute: 
08062                                         return step_do(c, stack, axis_to_type<axis_attribute>()); 
08063  
08064                                 case axis_GetChild: 
08065                                         return step_do(c, stack, axis_to_type<axis_GetChild>()); 
08066                                  
08067                                 case axis_descendant: 
08068                                         return step_do(c, stack, axis_to_type<axis_descendant>()); 
08069  
08070                                 case axis_descendant_or_self: 
08071                                         return step_do(c, stack, axis_to_type<axis_descendant_or_self>()); 
08072  
08073                                 case axis_following: 
08074                                         return step_do(c, stack, axis_to_type<axis_following>()); 
08075                                  
08076                                 case axis_following_sibling: 
08077                                         return step_do(c, stack, axis_to_type<axis_following_sibling>()); 
08078                                  
08079                                 case axis_namespace: 
08080                                         // namespaced axis is not supported 
08081                                         return XPathNodeSet_raw(); 
08082                                  
08083                                 case axis_GetParent: 
08084                                         return step_do(c, stack, axis_to_type<axis_GetParent>()); 
08085                                  
08086                                 case axis_preceding: 
08087                                         return step_do(c, stack, axis_to_type<axis_preceding>()); 
08088  
08089                                 case axis_preceding_sibling: 
08090                                         return step_do(c, stack, axis_to_type<axis_preceding_sibling>()); 
08091                                  
08092                                 case axis_self: 
08093                                         return step_do(c, stack, axis_to_type<axis_self>()); 
08094                                 } 
08095                         } 
08096  
08097                         case ast_step_GetRoot: 
08098                         { 
08099                                 assert(!_right); // GetRoot step can't have any predicates 
08100  
08101                                 XPathNodeSet_raw ns; 
08102  
08103                                 ns.SetType(XPathNodeSet::TypeSorted); 
08104  
08105                                 if (c.n.GetNode()) ns.push_back(c.n.GetNode().GetRoot(), stack.Result); 
08106                                 else if (c.n.GetAttribute()) ns.push_back(c.n.GetParent().GetRoot(), stack.Result); 
08107  
08108                                 return ns; 
08109                         } 
08110  
08111                         case ast_variable: 
08112                         { 
08113                                 assert(_retType == _data.variable->Type()); 
08114  
08115                                 if (_retType == XPathTypeNodeSet) 
08116                                 { 
08117                                         const XPathNodeSet& s = _data.variable->GetNodeSet(); 
08118  
08119                                         XPathNodeSet_raw ns; 
08120  
08121                                         ns.SetType(s.Type()); 
08122                                         ns.append(s.begin(), s.end(), stack.Result); 
08123  
08124                                         return ns; 
08125                                 } 
08126  
08127                                 // fallthrough to Type conversion 
08128                         } 
08129  
08130                         default: 
08131                                 assert(!"Wrong expression for return Type node set"); 
08132                                 return XPathNodeSet_raw(); 
08133                         } 
08134                 } 
08135                  
08136                 bool is_posinv() 
08137                 { 
08138                         switch (_type) 
08139                         { 
08140                         case ast_func_position: 
08141                                 return false; 
08142  
08143                         case ast_string_constant: 
08144                         case ast_number_constant: 
08145                         case ast_variable: 
08146                                 return true; 
08147  
08148                         case ast_step: 
08149                         case ast_step_GetRoot: 
08150                                 return true; 
08151  
08152                         case ast_predicate: 
08153                         case ast_filter: 
08154                         case ast_filter_posinv: 
08155                                 return true; 
08156  
08157                         default: 
08158                                 if (_left && !_left->is_posinv()) return false; 
08159                                  
08160                                 for (XPathAstNode* n = _right; n; n = n->_next) 
08161                                         if (!n->is_posinv()) return false; 
08162                                          
08163                                 return true; 
08164                         } 
08165                 } 
08166  
08167                 XPathValueType retType() const 
08168                 { 
08169                         return static_cast<XPathValueType>(_retType); 
08170                 } 
08171         }; 
08172  
08173         struct XPathParser 
08174         { 
08175                 XPathAllocator* _alloc; 
08176                 XPathLexer _lexer; 
08177  
08178                 const char_t* _query; 
08179                 XPathVariableSet* _variables; 
08180  
08181                 XPathParseResult* _Result; 
08182  
08183         #ifdef XML_NO_EXCEPTIONS 
08184                 jmp_buf _error_handler; 
08185         #endif 
08186  
08187                 void throw_error(const char* message) 
08188                 { 
08189                         _Result->error = message; 
08190                         _Result->Offset = _lexer.current_pos() - _query; 
08191  
08192                 #ifdef XML_NO_EXCEPTIONS 
08193                         longjmp(_error_handler, 1); 
08194                 #else 
08195                         throw XPathException(*_Result); 
08196                 #endif 
08197                 } 
08198  
08199                 void throw_error_oom() 
08200                 { 
08201                 #ifdef XML_NO_EXCEPTIONS 
08202                         throw_error("Out of memory"); 
08203                 #else 
08204                         throw std::bad_alloc(); 
08205                 #endif 
08206                 } 
08207  
08208                 void* alloc_node() 
08209                 { 
08210                         void* Result = _alloc->allocate_nothrow(sizeof(XPathAstNode)); 
08211  
08212                         if (!Result) throw_error_oom(); 
08213  
08214                         return Result; 
08215                 } 
08216  
08217                 const char_t* alloc_string(const XPathLexerString& Value) 
08218                 { 
08219                         if (Value.begin) 
08220                         { 
08221                                 size_t length = static_cast<size_t>(Value.end - Value.begin); 
08222  
08223                                 char_t* c = static_cast<char_t*>(_alloc->allocate_nothrow((length + 1) * sizeof(char_t))); 
08224                                 if (!c) throw_error_oom(); 
08225  
08226                                 memcpy(c, Value.begin, length * sizeof(char_t)); 
08227                                 c[length] = 0; 
08228  
08229                                 return c; 
08230                         } 
08231                         else return 0; 
08232                 } 
08233  
08234                 XPathAstNode* ParseFunctionHelper(ast_type_t Type0, ast_type_t Type1, size_t argc, XPathAstNode* args[2]) 
08235                 { 
08236                         assert(argc <= 1); 
08237  
08238                         if (argc == 1 && args[0]->retType() != XPathTypeNodeSet) throw_error("Function has to be applied to node set"); 
08239  
08240                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(argc == 0 ? Type0 : Type1, XPathTypeString, args[0]); 
08241                 } 
08242  
08243                 XPathAstNode* ParseFunction(const XPathLexerString& Name, size_t argc, XPathAstNode* args[2]) 
08244                 { 
08245                         switch (Name.begin[0]) 
08246                         { 
08247                         case 'b': 
08248                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("boolean") && argc == 1) 
08249                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_boolean, XPathTypeBoolean, args[0]); 
08250                                          
08251                                 break; 
08252                          
08253                         case 'c': 
08254                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("count") && argc == 1) 
08255                                 { 
08256                                         if (args[0]->retType() != XPathTypeNodeSet) throw_error("Function has to be applied to node set"); 
08257                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_count, XPathTypeNumber, args[0]); 
08258                                 } 
08259                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("contains") && argc == 2) 
08260                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_contains, XPathTypeString, args[0], args[1]); 
08261                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("concat") && argc >= 2) 
08262                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_concat, XPathTypeString, args[0], args[1]); 
08263                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("ceiling") && argc == 1) 
08264                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_ceiling, XPathTypeNumber, args[0]); 
08265                                          
08266                                 break; 
08267                          
08268                         case 'f': 
08269                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("false") && argc == 0) 
08270                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_false, XPathTypeBoolean); 
08271                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("floor") && argc == 1) 
08272                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_floor, XPathTypeNumber, args[0]); 
08273                                          
08274                                 break; 
08275                          
08276                         case 'i': 
08277                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("id") && argc == 1) 
08278                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_id, XPathTypeNodeSet, args[0]); 
08279                                          
08280                                 break; 
08281                          
08282                         case 'l': 
08283                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("last") && argc == 0) 
08284                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_last, XPathTypeNumber); 
08285                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("lang") && argc == 1) 
08286                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_lang, XPathTypeBoolean, args[0]); 
08287                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("local-Name") && argc <= 1) 
08288                                         return ParseFunctionHelper(ast_func_local_Name_0, ast_func_local_Name_1, argc, args); 
08289                          
08290                                 break; 
08291                          
08292                         case 'n': 
08293                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("Name") && argc <= 1) 
08294                                         return ParseFunctionHelper(ast_func_Name_0, ast_func_Name_1, argc, args); 
08295                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("namespace-uri") && argc <= 1) 
08296                                         return ParseFunctionHelper(ast_func_namespace_uri_0, ast_func_namespace_uri_1, argc, args); 
08297                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("normalize-space") && argc <= 1) 
08298                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(argc == 0 ? ast_func_normalize_space_0 : ast_func_normalize_space_1, XPathTypeString, args[0], args[1]); 
08299                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("not") && argc == 1) 
08300                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_not, XPathTypeBoolean, args[0]); 
08301                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("number") && argc <= 1) 
08302                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(argc == 0 ? ast_func_number_0 : ast_func_number_1, XPathTypeNumber, args[0]); 
08303                          
08304                                 break; 
08305                          
08306                         case 'p': 
08307                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("position") && argc == 0) 
08308                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_position, XPathTypeNumber); 
08309                                  
08310                                 break; 
08311                          
08312                         case 'r': 
08313                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("round") && argc == 1) 
08314                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_round, XPathTypeNumber, args[0]); 
08315  
08316                                 break; 
08317                          
08318                         case 's': 
08319                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("string") && argc <= 1) 
08320                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(argc == 0 ? ast_func_string_0 : ast_func_string_1, XPathTypeString, args[0]); 
08321                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("string-length") && argc <= 1) 
08322                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(argc == 0 ? ast_func_string_length_0 : ast_func_string_length_1, XPathTypeString, args[0]); 
08323                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("starts-with") && argc == 2) 
08324                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_starts_with, XPathTypeBoolean, args[0], args[1]); 
08325                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("substring-before") && argc == 2) 
08326                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_substring_before, XPathTypeString, args[0], args[1]); 
08327                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("substring-after") && argc == 2) 
08328                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_substring_after, XPathTypeString, args[0], args[1]); 
08329                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("substring") && (argc == 2 || argc == 3)) 
08330                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(argc == 2 ? ast_func_substring_2 : ast_func_substring_3, XPathTypeString, args[0], args[1]); 
08331                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("sum") && argc == 1) 
08332                                 { 
08333                                         if (args[0]->retType() != XPathTypeNodeSet) throw_error("Function has to be applied to node set"); 
08334                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_sum, XPathTypeNumber, args[0]); 
08335                                 } 
08336  
08337                                 break; 
08338                          
08339                         case 't': 
08340                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("translate") && argc == 3) 
08341                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_translate, XPathTypeString, args[0], args[1]); 
08342                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("true") && argc == 0) 
08343                                         return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_func_true, XPathTypeBoolean); 
08344                                          
08345                                 break; 
08346                         } 
08347  
08348                         throw_error("Unrecognized function or wrong parameter count"); 
08349  
08350                         return 0; 
08351                 } 
08352  
08353                 axis_t ParseAxisName(const XPathLexerString& Name, bool& specified) 
08354                 { 
08355                         specified = true; 
08356  
08357                         switch (Name.begin[0]) 
08358                         { 
08359                         case 'a': 
08360                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("ancestor")) 
08361                                         return axis_ancestor; 
08362                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("ancestor-or-self")) 
08363                                         return axis_ancestor_or_self; 
08364                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("GetAttribute")) 
08365                                         return axis_attribute; 
08366                                  
08367                                 break; 
08368                          
08369                         case 'c': 
08370                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("GetChild")) 
08371                                         return axis_GetChild; 
08372                                  
08373                                 break; 
08374                          
08375                         case 'd': 
08376                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("descendant")) 
08377                                         return axis_descendant; 
08378                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("descendant-or-self")) 
08379                                         return axis_descendant_or_self; 
08380                                  
08381                                 break; 
08382                          
08383                         case 'f': 
08384                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("following")) 
08385                                         return axis_following; 
08386                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("following-sibling")) 
08387                                         return axis_following_sibling; 
08388                                  
08389                                 break; 
08390                          
08391                         case 'n': 
08392                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("namespace")) 
08393                                         return axis_namespace; 
08394                                  
08395                                 break; 
08396                          
08397                         case 'p': 
08398                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("GetParent")) 
08399                                         return axis_GetParent; 
08400                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("preceding")) 
08401                                         return axis_preceding; 
08402                                 else if (Name == XML_TEXT("preceding-sibling")) 
08403                                         return axis_preceding_sibling; 
08404                                  
08405                                 break; 
08406                          
08407                         case 's': 
08408                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("self")) 
08409                                         return axis_self; 
08410                                  
08411                                 break; 
08412                         } 
08413  
08414                         specified = false; 
08415                         return axis_GetChild; 
08416                 } 
08417  
08418                 nodetest_t ParseNodeTest_type(const XPathLexerString& Name) 
08419                 { 
08420                         switch (Name.begin[0]) 
08421                         { 
08422                         case 'c': 
08423                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("comment")) 
08424                                         return nodetest_type_comment; 
08425  
08426                                 break; 
08427  
08428                         case 'n': 
08429                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("node")) 
08430                                         return nodetest_type_node; 
08431  
08432                                 break; 
08433  
08434                         case 'p': 
08435                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("processing-instruction")) 
08436                                         return nodetest_type_pi; 
08437  
08438                                 break; 
08439  
08440                         case 't': 
08441                                 if (Name == XML_TEXT("text")) 
08442                                         return nodetest_type_text; 
08443  
08444                                 break; 
08445                         } 
08446  
08447                         return nodetest_none; 
08448                 } 
08449
