08450                 // PrimaryExpr ::= VariableReference | '(' Expr ')' | Literal | Number | FunctionCall 
08451                 XPathAstNode* ParsePrimaryExpression() 
08452                 { 
08453                         switch (_lexer.current()) 
08454                         { 
08455                         case lex_var_ref: 
08456                         { 
08457                                 XPathLexerString Name = _lexer.contents(); 
08458  
08459                                 if (!_variables) 
08460                                         throw_error("Unknown variable: variable set is not provided"); 
08461  
08462                                 XPathVariable* var = GetVariable(_variables, Name.begin, Name.end); 
08463  
08464                                 if (!var) 
08465                                         throw_error("Unknown variable: variable set does not contain the given Name"); 
08466  
08467                                 _lexer.next(); 
08468  
08469                                 return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_variable, var->Type(), var); 
08470                         } 
08471  
08472                         case lex_open_brace: 
08473                         { 
08474                                 _lexer.next(); 
08475  
08476                                 XPathAstNode* n = ParseExpression(); 
08477  
08478                                 if (_lexer.current() != lex_close_brace) 
08479                                         throw_error("Unmatched braces"); 
08480  
08481                                 _lexer.next(); 
08482  
08483                                 return n; 
08484                         } 
08485  
08486                         case lex_quoted_string: 
08487                         { 
08488                                 const char_t* Value = alloc_string(_lexer.contents()); 
08489  
08490                                 XPathAstNode* n = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_string_constant, XPathTypeString, Value); 
08491                                 _lexer.next(); 
08492  
08493                                 return n; 
08494                         } 
08495  
08496                         case lex_number: 
08497                         { 
08498                                 double Value = 0; 
08499  
08500                                 if (!convert_Stringo_number(_lexer.contents().begin, _lexer.contents().end, &Value)) 
08501                                         throw_error_oom(); 
08502  
08503                                 XPathAstNode* n = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_number_constant, XPathTypeNumber, Value); 
08504                                 _lexer.next(); 
08505  
08506                                 return n; 
08507                         } 
08508  
08509                         case lex_string: 
08510                         { 
08511                                 XPathAstNode* args[2] = {0}; 
08512                                 size_t argc = 0; 
08513                                  
08514                                 XPathLexerString function = _lexer.contents(); 
08515                                 _lexer.next(); 
08516                                  
08517                                 XPathAstNode* LastArg = 0; 
08518                                  
08519                                 if (_lexer.current() != lex_open_brace) 
08520                                         throw_error("Unrecognized function call"); 
08521                                 _lexer.next(); 
08522  
08523                                 if (_lexer.current() != lex_close_brace) 
08524                                         args[argc++] = ParseExpression(); 
08525  
08526                                 while (_lexer.current() != lex_close_brace) 
08527                                 { 
08528                                         if (_lexer.current() != lex_comma) 
08529                                                 throw_error("No comma between function arguments"); 
08530                                         _lexer.next(); 
08531                                          
08532                                         XPathAstNode* n = ParseExpression(); 
08533                                          
08534                                         if (argc < 2) args[argc] = n; 
08535                                         else LastArg->SetNext(n); 
08536  
08537                                         argc++; 
08538                                         LastArg = n; 
08539                                 } 
08540                                  
08541                                 _lexer.next(); 
08542  
08543                                 return ParseFunction(function, argc, args); 
08544                         } 
08545  
08546                         default: 
08547                                 throw_error("Unrecognizable primary expression"); 
08548  
08549                                 return 0; 
08550                         } 
08551                 } 
08552                  
08553                 // FilterExpr ::= PrimaryExpr | FilterExpr Predicate 
08554                 // Predicate ::= '[' PredicateExpr ']' 
08555                 // PredicateExpr ::= Expr 
08556                 XPathAstNode* ParseFilterExpression() 
08557                 { 
08558                         XPathAstNode* n = ParsePrimaryExpression(); 
08559  
08560                         while (_lexer.current() == lex_open_square_brace) 
08561                         { 
08562                                 _lexer.next(); 
08563  
08564                                 XPathAstNode* expr = ParseExpression(); 
08565  
08566                                 if (n->retType() != XPathTypeNodeSet) throw_error("Predicate has to be applied to node set"); 
08567  
08568                                 bool posinv = expr->retType() != XPathTypeNumber && expr->is_posinv(); 
08569  
08570                                 n = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(posinv ? ast_filter_posinv : ast_filter, XPathTypeNodeSet, n, expr); 
08571  
08572                                 if (_lexer.current() != lex_close_square_brace) 
08573                                         throw_error("Unmatched square brace"); 
08574                          
08575                                 _lexer.next(); 
08576                         } 
08577                          
08578                         return n; 
08579                 } 
08580                  
08581                 // Step ::= AxisSpecifier NodeTest Predicate* | AbbreviatedStep 
08582                 // AxisSpecifier ::= AxisName '::' | '@'? 
08583                 // NodeTest ::= NameTest | NodeType '(' ')' | 'processing-instruction' '(' Literal ')' 
08584                 // NameTest ::= '*' | NCName ':' '*' | QName 
08585                 // AbbreviatedStep ::= '.' | '..' 
08586                 XPathAstNode* ParseStep(XPathAstNode* set) 
08587                 { 
08588                         if (set && set->retType() != XPathTypeNodeSet) 
08589                                 throw_error("Step has to be applied to node set"); 
08590  
08591                         bool axis_specified = false; 
08592                         axis_t axis = axis_GetChild; // implied GetChild axis 
08593  
08594                         if (_lexer.current() == lex_axis_attribute) 
08595                         { 
08596                                 axis = axis_attribute; 
08597                                 axis_specified = true; 
08598                                  
08599                                 _lexer.next(); 
08600                         } 
08601                         else if (_lexer.current() == lex_dot) 
08602                         { 
08603                                 _lexer.next(); 
08604                                  
08605                                 return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_step, set, axis_self, nodetest_type_node, 0); 
08606                         } 
08607                         else if (_lexer.current() == lex_double_dot) 
08608                         { 
08609                                 _lexer.next(); 
08610                                  
08611                                 return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_step, set, axis_GetParent, nodetest_type_node, 0); 
08612                         } 
08613                  
08614                         nodetest_t nt_type = nodetest_none; 
08615                         XPathLexerString nt_Name; 
08616                          
08617                         if (_lexer.current() == lex_string) 
08618                         { 
08619                                 // node Name test 
08620                                 nt_Name = _lexer.contents(); 
08621                                 _lexer.next(); 
08622  
08623                                 // was it an axis Name? 
08624                                 if (_lexer.current() == lex_double_colon) 
08625                                 { 
08626                                         // parse axis Name 
08627                                         if (axis_specified) throw_error("Two axis specifiers in one step"); 
08628  
08629                                         axis = ParseAxisName(nt_Name, axis_specified); 
08630  
08631                                         if (!axis_specified) throw_error("Unknown axis"); 
08632  
08633                                         // read actual node test 
08634                                         _lexer.next(); 
08635  
08636                                         if (_lexer.current() == lex_multiply) 
08637                                         { 
08638                                                 nt_type = nodetest_all; 
08639                                                 nt_Name = XPathLexerString(); 
08640                                                 _lexer.next(); 
08641                                         } 
08642                                         else if (_lexer.current() == lex_string) 
08643                                         { 
08644                                                 nt_Name = _lexer.contents(); 
08645                                                 _lexer.next(); 
08646                                         } 
08647                                         else throw_error("Unrecognized node test"); 
08648                                 } 
08649                                  
08650                                 if (nt_type == nodetest_none) 
08651                                 { 
08652                                         // node Type test or processing-instruction 
08653                                         if (_lexer.current() == lex_open_brace) 
08654                                         { 
08655                                                 _lexer.next(); 
08656                                                  
08657                                                 if (_lexer.current() == lex_close_brace) 
08658                                                 { 
08659                                                         _lexer.next(); 
08660  
08661                                                         nt_type = ParseNodeTest_type(nt_Name); 
08662  
08663                                                         if (nt_type == nodetest_none) throw_error("Unrecognized node Type"); 
08664                                                          
08665                                                         nt_Name = XPathLexerString(); 
08666                                                 } 
08667                                                 else if (nt_Name == XML_TEXT("processing-instruction")) 
08668                                                 { 
08669                                                         if (_lexer.current() != lex_quoted_string) 
08670                                                                 throw_error("Only literals are allowed as arguments to processing-instruction()"); 
08671                                                  
08672                                                         nt_type = nodetest_pi; 
08673                                                         nt_Name = _lexer.contents(); 
08674                                                         _lexer.next(); 
08675                                                          
08676                                                         if (_lexer.current() != lex_close_brace) 
08677                                                                 throw_error("Unmatched brace near processing-instruction()"); 
08678                                                         _lexer.next(); 
08679                                                 } 
08680                                                 else 
08681                                                         throw_error("Unmatched brace near node Type test"); 
08682  
08683                                         } 
08684                                         // QName or NCName:* 
08685                                         else 
08686                                         { 
08687                                                 if (nt_Name.end - nt_Name.begin > 2 && nt_Name.end[-2] == ':' && nt_Name.end[-1] == '*') // NCName:* 
08688                                                 { 
08689                                                         nt_Name.end--; // erase * 
08690                                                          
08691                                                         nt_type = nodetest_all_in_namespace; 
08692                                                 } 
08693                                                 else nt_type = nodetest_Name; 
08694                                         } 
08695                                 } 
08696                         } 
08697                         else if (_lexer.current() == lex_multiply) 
08698                         { 
08699                                 nt_type = nodetest_all; 
08700                                 _lexer.next(); 
08701                         } 
08702                         else throw_error("Unrecognized node test"); 
08703                          
08704                         XPathAstNode* n = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_step, set, axis, nt_type, alloc_string(nt_Name)); 
08705                          
08706                         XPathAstNode* last = 0; 
08707                          
08708                         while (_lexer.current() == lex_open_square_brace) 
08709                         { 
08710                                 _lexer.next(); 
08711                                  
08712                                 XPathAstNode* expr = ParseExpression(); 
08713  
08714                                 XPathAstNode* pred = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_predicate, XPathTypeNodeSet, expr); 
08715                                  
08716                                 if (_lexer.current() != lex_close_square_brace) 
08717                                         throw_error("Unmatched square brace"); 
08718                                 _lexer.next(); 
08719                                  
08720                                 if (last) last->SetNext(pred); 
08721                                 else n->SetRight(pred); 
08722                                  
08723                                 last = pred; 
08724                         } 
08725                          
08726                         return n; 
08727                 } 
08728                  
08729                 // RelativeLocationPath ::= Step | RelativeLocationPath '/' Step | RelativeLocationPath '//' Step 
08730                 XPathAstNode* ParseRelativeLocation_Path(XPathAstNode* set) 
08731                 { 
08732                         XPathAstNode* n = ParseStep(set); 
08733                          
08734                         while (_lexer.current() == lex_slash || _lexer.current() == lex_double_slash) 
08735                         { 
08736                                 lexeme_t l = _lexer.current(); 
08737                                 _lexer.next(); 
08738  
08739                                 if (l == lex_double_slash) 
08740                                         n = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_step, n, axis_descendant_or_self, nodetest_type_node, 0); 
08741                                  
08742                                 n = ParseStep(n); 
08743                         } 
08744                          
08745                         return n; 
08746                 } 
08747                  
08748                 // LocationPath ::= RelativeLocationPath | AbsoluteLocationPath 
08749                 // AbsoluteLocationPath ::= '/' RelativeLocationPath? | '//' RelativeLocationPath 
08750                 XPathAstNode* ParseLocationPath() 
08751                 { 
08752                         if (_lexer.current() == lex_slash) 
08753                         { 
08754                                 _lexer.next(); 
08755                                  
08756                                 XPathAstNode* n = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_step_GetRoot, XPathTypeNodeSet); 
08757  
08758                                 // relative location Path can start from axis_attribute, dot, double_dot, multiply and string lexemes; any other lexeme means standalone GetRoot Path 
08759                                 lexeme_t l = _lexer.current(); 
08760  
08761                                 if (l == lex_string || l == lex_axis_attribute || l == lex_dot || l == lex_double_dot || l == lex_multiply) 
08762                                         return ParseRelativeLocation_Path(n); 
08763                                 else 
08764                                         return n; 
08765                         } 
08766                         else if (_lexer.current() == lex_double_slash) 
08767                         { 
08768                                 _lexer.next(); 
08769                                  
08770                                 XPathAstNode* n = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_step_GetRoot, XPathTypeNodeSet); 
08771                                 n = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_step, n, axis_descendant_or_self, nodetest_type_node, 0); 
08772                                  
08773                                 return ParseRelativeLocation_Path(n); 
08774                         } 
08775  
08776                         // else clause moved outside of if because of bogus warning 'control may reach end of non-void function being inlined' in gcc 4.0.1 
08777                         return ParseRelativeLocation_Path(0); 
08778                 } 
08779                  
08780                 // PathExpr ::= LocationPath 
08781                 //                              | FilterExpr 
08782                 //                              | FilterExpr '/' RelativeLocationPath 
08783                 //                              | FilterExpr '//' RelativeLocationPath 
08784                 XPathAstNode* ParsePathExpression() 
08785                 { 
08786                         // Clarification. 
08787                         // PathExpr begins with either LocationPath or FilterExpr. 
08788                         // FilterExpr begins with PrimaryExpr 
08789                         // PrimaryExpr begins with '$' in case of it being a variable reference, 
08790                         // '(' in case of it being an expression, string literal, number constant or 
08791                         // function call. 
08792  
08793                         if (_lexer.current() == lex_var_ref || _lexer.current() == lex_open_brace ||  
08794                                 _lexer.current() == lex_quoted_string || _lexer.current() == lex_number || 
08795                                 _lexer.current() == lex_string) 
08796                         { 
08797                                 if (_lexer.current() == lex_string) 
08798                                 { 
08799                                         // This is either a function call, or not - if not, we shall proceed with location Path 
08800                                         const char_t* state = _lexer.state(); 
08801                                          
08802                                         while (IS_CHARTYPE(*state, ct_space)) ++state; 
08803                                          
08804                                         if (*state != '(') return ParseLocationPath(); 
08805  
08806                                         // This looks like a function call; however this still can be a node-test. Check it. 
08807                                         if (ParseNodeTest_type(_lexer.contents()) != nodetest_none) return ParseLocationPath(); 
08808                                 } 
08809                                  
08810                                 XPathAstNode* n = ParseFilterExpression(); 
08811  
08812                                 if (_lexer.current() == lex_slash || _lexer.current() == lex_double_slash) 
08813                                 { 
08814                                         lexeme_t l = _lexer.current(); 
08815                                         _lexer.next(); 
08816                                          
08817                                         if (l == lex_double_slash) 
08818                                         { 
08819                                                 if (n->retType() != XPathTypeNodeSet) throw_error("Step has to be applied to node set"); 
08820  
08821                                                 n = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_step, n, axis_descendant_or_self, nodetest_type_node, 0); 
08822                                         } 
08823          
08824                                         // select from location Path 
08825                                         return ParseRelativeLocation_Path(n); 
08826                                 } 
08827  
08828                                 return n; 
08829                         } 
08830                         else return ParseLocationPath(); 
08831                 } 
08832  
08833                 // UnionExpr ::= PathExpr | UnionExpr '|' PathExpr 
08834                 XPathAstNode* ParseUnionExpression() 
08835                 { 
08836                         XPathAstNode* n = ParsePathExpression(); 
08837  
08838                         while (_lexer.current() == lex_union) 
08839                         { 
08840                                 _lexer.next(); 
08841  
08842                                 XPathAstNode* expr = ParseUnionExpression(); 
08843  
08844                                 if (n->retType() != XPathTypeNodeSet || expr->retType() != XPathTypeNodeSet) 
08845                                         throw_error("Union operator has to be applied to node sets"); 
08846  
08847                                 n = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_op_union, XPathTypeNodeSet, n, expr); 
08848                         } 
08849  
08850                         return n; 
08851                 } 
08852  
08853                 // UnaryExpr ::= UnionExpr | '-' UnaryExpr 
08854                 XPathAstNode* ParseUnaryExpression() 
08855                 { 
08856                         if (_lexer.current() == lex_minus) 
08857                         { 
08858                                 _lexer.next(); 
08859  
08860                                 XPathAstNode* expr = ParseUnaryExpression(); 
08861  
08862                                 return new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_op_negate, XPathTypeNumber, expr); 
08863                         } 
08864                         else return ParseUnionExpression(); 
08865                 } 
08866                  
08867                 // MultiplicativeExpr ::= UnaryExpr 
08868                 //                                                | MultiplicativeExpr '*' UnaryExpr 
08869                 //                                                | MultiplicativeExpr 'div' UnaryExpr 
08870                 //                                                | MultiplicativeExpr 'mod' UnaryExpr 
08871                 XPathAstNode* ParseMultiplicativeExpression() 
08872                 { 
08873                         XPathAstNode* n = ParseUnaryExpression(); 
08874  
08875                         while (_lexer.current() == lex_multiply || (_lexer.current() == lex_string && 
08876                                    (_lexer.contents() == XML_TEXT("mod") || _lexer.contents() == XML_TEXT("div")))) 
08877                         { 
08878                                 ast_type_t op = _lexer.current() == lex_multiply ? ast_op_multiply : 
08879                                         _lexer.contents().begin[0] == 'd' ? ast_op_divide : ast_op_mod; 
08880                                 _lexer.next(); 
08881  
08882                                 XPathAstNode* expr = ParseUnaryExpression(); 
08883  
08884                                 n = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(op, XPathTypeNumber, n, expr); 
08885                         } 
08886  
08887                         return n; 
08888                 } 
08889  
08890                 // AdditiveExpr ::= MultiplicativeExpr 
08891                 //                                      | AdditiveExpr '+' MultiplicativeExpr 
08892                 //                                      | AdditiveExpr '-' MultiplicativeExpr 
08893                 XPathAstNode* ParseAdditiveExpression() 
08894                 { 
08895                         XPathAstNode* n = ParseMultiplicativeExpression(); 
08896  
08897                         while (_lexer.current() == lex_plus || _lexer.current() == lex_minus) 
08898                         { 
08899                                 lexeme_t l = _lexer.current(); 
08900  
08901                                 _lexer.next(); 
08902  
08903                                 XPathAstNode* expr = ParseMultiplicativeExpression(); 
08904  
08905                                 n = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(l == lex_plus ? ast_op_add : ast_op_subtract, XPathTypeNumber, n, expr); 
08906                         } 
08907  
08908                         return n; 
08909                 } 
08910  
08911                 // RelationalExpr ::= AdditiveExpr 
08912                 //                                        | RelationalExpr '<' AdditiveExpr 
08913                 //                                        | RelationalExpr '>' AdditiveExpr 
08914                 //                                        | RelationalExpr '<=' AdditiveExpr 
08915                 //                                        | RelationalExpr '>=' AdditiveExpr 
08916                 XPathAstNode* ParseRelationalExpression() 
08917                 { 
08918                         XPathAstNode* n = ParseAdditiveExpression(); 
08919  
08920                         while (_lexer.current() == lex_less || _lexer.current() == lex_less_or_equal ||  
08921                                    _lexer.current() == lex_greater || _lexer.current() == lex_greater_or_equal) 
08922                         { 
08923                                 lexeme_t l = _lexer.current(); 
08924                                 _lexer.next(); 
08925  
08926                                 XPathAstNode* expr = ParseAdditiveExpression(); 
08927  
08928                                 n = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(l == lex_less ? ast_op_less : l == lex_greater ? ast_op_greater : 
08929                                                                 l == lex_less_or_equal ? ast_op_less_or_equal : ast_op_greater_or_equal, XPathTypeBoolean, n, expr); 
08930                         } 
08931  
08932                         return n; 
08933                 } 
08934                  
08935                 // EqualityExpr ::= RelationalExpr 
08936                 //                                      | EqualityExpr '=' RelationalExpr 
08937                 //                                      | EqualityExpr '!=' RelationalExpr 
08938                 XPathAstNode* ParseEqualityExpression() 
08939                 { 
08940                         XPathAstNode* n = ParseRelationalExpression(); 
08941  
08942                         while (_lexer.current() == lex_equal || _lexer.current() == lex_not_equal) 
08943                         { 
08944                                 lexeme_t l = _lexer.current(); 
08945  
08946                                 _lexer.next(); 
08947  
08948                                 XPathAstNode* expr = ParseRelationalExpression(); 
08949  
08950                                 n = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(l == lex_equal ? ast_op_equal : ast_op_not_equal, XPathTypeBoolean, n, expr); 
08951                         } 
08952  
08953                         return n; 
08954                 } 
08955                  
08956                 // AndExpr ::= EqualityExpr | AndExpr 'and' EqualityExpr 
08957                 XPathAstNode* ParseAndExpression() 
08958                 { 
08959                         XPathAstNode* n = ParseEqualityExpression(); 
08960  
08961                         while (_lexer.current() == lex_string && _lexer.contents() == XML_TEXT("and")) 
08962                         { 
08963                                 _lexer.next(); 
08964  
08965                                 XPathAstNode* expr = ParseEqualityExpression(); 
08966  
08967                                 n = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_op_and, XPathTypeBoolean, n, expr); 
08968                         } 
08969  
08970                         return n; 
08971                 } 
08972  
08973                 // OrExpr ::= AndExpr | OrExpr 'or' AndExpr 
08974                 XPathAstNode* ParseOrExpression() 
08975                 { 
08976                         XPathAstNode* n = ParseAndExpression(); 
08977  
08978                         while (_lexer.current() == lex_string && _lexer.contents() == XML_TEXT("or")) 
08979                         { 
08980                                 _lexer.next(); 
08981  
08982                                 XPathAstNode* expr = ParseAndExpression(); 
08983  
08984                                 n = new (alloc_node()) XPathAstNode(ast_op_or, XPathTypeBoolean, n, expr); 
08985                         } 
08986  
08987                         return n; 
08988                 } 
08989                  
08990                 // Expr ::= OrExpr 
08991                 XPathAstNode* ParseExpression() 
08992                 { 
08993                         return ParseOrExpression(); 
08994                 } 
08995  
08996                 XPathParser(const char_t* query, XPathVariableSet* variables, XPathAllocator* alloc, XPathParseResult* Result): _alloc(alloc), _lexer(query), _query(query), _variables(variables), _Result(Result) 
08997                 { 
08998                 } 
08999  
09000                 XPathAstNode* parse() 
09001                 { 
09002                         XPathAstNode* Result = ParseExpression(); 
09003                          
09004                         if (_lexer.current() != lex_eof) 
09005                         { 
09006                                 // there are still unparsed tokens left, error 
09007                                 throw_error("Incorrect query"); 
09008                         } 
09009                          
09010                         return Result; 
09011                 } 
09012  
09013                 static XPathAstNode* parse(const char_t* query, XPathVariableSet* variables, XPathAllocator* alloc, XPathParseResult* Result) 
09014                 { 
09015                         XPathParser parser(query, variables, alloc, Result); 
09016  
09017                 #ifdef XML_NO_EXCEPTIONS 
09018                         int error = setjmp(parser._error_handler); 
09019  
09020                         return (error == 0) ? parser.parse() : 0; 
09021                 #else 
09022                         return parser.parse(); 
09023                 #endif 
09024                 } 
09025         }; 
09026  
09027         struct XPathQueryImpl 
09028         { 
09029                 static XPathQueryImpl* create() 
09030                 { 
09031                         void* memory = global_allocate(sizeof(XPathQueryImpl)); 
09032  
09033                         return new (memory) XPathQueryImpl(); 
09034                 } 
09035  
09036                 static void destroy(void* ptr) 
09037                 { 
09038                         if (!ptr) return; 
09039                          
09040                         // free all allocated pages 
09041                         static_cast<XPathQueryImpl*>(ptr)->alloc.release(); 
09042  
09043                         // free allocator memory (with the first page) 
09044                         global_deallocate(ptr); 
09045                 } 
09046  
09047                 XPathQueryImpl(): GetRoot(0), alloc(&block) 
09048                 { 
09049                         block.next = 0; 
09050                 } 
09051  
09052                 XPathAstNode* GetRoot; 
09053                 XPathAllocator alloc; 
09054                 XPathMemoryBlock block; 
09055         }; 
09056  
09057         XPathString EvaluateString_impl(XPathQueryImpl* impl, const XPathNode& n, XPathStackData& sd) 
09058         { 
09059                 if (!impl) return XPathString(); 
09060  
09061         #ifdef XML_NO_EXCEPTIONS 
09062                 if (setjmp(sd.error_handler)) return XPathString(); 
09063         #endif 
09064  
09065                 XPathContext c(n, 1, 1); 
09066  
09067                 return impl->GetRoot->eval_string(c, sd.stack); 
09068         } 
09069 } 
09070  
09071 
09072 namespace phys
09073 { namespace xml
09074 { 
09075 #ifndef XML_NO_EXCEPTIONS 
09076         XPathException::XPathException(const XPathParseResult& Result): _Result(Result) 
09077         { 
09078                 assert(Result.error); 
09079         } 
09080          
09081         const char* XPathException::what() const throw() 
09082         { 
09083                 return _Result.error; 
09084         } 
09085  
09086         const XPathParseResult& XPathException::Result() const 
09087         { 
09088                 return _Result; 
09089         } 
09090 #endif 
09091          
09092         XPathNode::XPathNode() 
09093         { 
09094         } 
09095                  
09096         XPathNode::XPathNode(const Node& node): _node(node) 
09097         { 
09098         } 
09099                  
09100         XPathNode::XPathNode(const Attribute& GetAttribute, const Node& GetParent): _node(GetAttribute ? GetParent : Node()), _attribute(GetAttribute) 
09101         { 
09102         } 
09103  
09104         Node XPathNode::GetNode() const 
09105         { 
09106                 return _attribute ? Node() : _node; 
09107         } 
09108                  
09109         Attribute XPathNode::GetAttribute() const 
09110         { 
09111                 return _attribute; 
09112         } 
09113          
09114         Node XPathNode::GetParent() const 
09115         { 
09116                 return _attribute ? _node : _node.GetParent(); 
09117         } 
09118  
09119         XPathNode::operator XPathNode::unspecified_bool_type() const 
09120         { 
09121                 return (_node || _attribute) ? &XPathNode::_node : 0; 
09122         } 
09123          
09124         bool XPathNode::operator!() const 
09125         { 
09126                 return !(_node || _attribute); 
09127         } 
09128  
09129         bool XPathNode::operator==(const XPathNode& n) const 
09130         { 
09131                 return _node == n._node && _attribute == n._attribute; 
09132         } 
09133          
09134         bool XPathNode::operator!=(const XPathNode& n) const 
09135         { 
09136                 return _node != n._node || _attribute != n._attribute; 
09137         } 
09138  
09139 #ifdef __BORLANDC__ 
09140         bool operator&&(const XPathNode& lhs, bool rhs) 
09141         { 
09142                 return (bool)lhs && rhs; 
09143         } 
09144  
09145         bool operator||(const XPathNode& lhs, bool rhs) 
09146         { 
09147                 return (bool)lhs || rhs; 
09148         } 
09149 #endif 
09150  
09151         void XPathNodeSet::_assign(const_iterator begin, const_iterator end) 
09152         { 
09153                 assert(begin <= end); 
09154  
09155                 size_t size = static_cast<size_t>(end - begin); 
09156  
09157                 if (size <= 1) 
09158                 { 
09159                         // deallocate old buffer 
09160                         if (_begin != &_storage) global_deallocate(_begin); 
09161  
09162                         // use internal buffer 
09163                         if (begin != end) _storage = *begin; 
09164  
09165                         _begin = &_storage; 
09166                         _end = &_storage + size; 
09167                 } 
09168                 else 
09169                 { 
09170                         // make heap copy 
09171                         XPathNode* storage = static_cast<XPathNode*>(global_allocate(size * sizeof(XPathNode))); 
09172  
09173                         if (!storage) 
09174                         { 
09175                         #ifdef XML_NO_EXCEPTIONS 
09176                                 return; 
09177                         #else 
09178                                 throw std::bad_alloc(); 
09179                         #endif 
09180                         } 
09181  
09182                         memcpy(storage, begin, size * sizeof(XPathNode)); 
09183                          
09184                         // deallocate old buffer 
09185                         if (_begin != &_storage) global_deallocate(_begin); 
09186  
09187                         // finalize 
09188                         _begin = storage; 
09189                         _end = storage + size; 
09190                 } 
09191         } 
09192  
09193         XPathNodeSet::XPathNodeSet(): _type(TypeUnsorted), _begin(&_storage), _end(&_storage) 
09194         { 
09195         } 
09196  
09197         XPathNodeSet::XPathNodeSet(const_iterator begin, const_iterator end, CollectionType Type): _type(Type), _begin(&_storage), _end(&_storage) 
09198         { 
09199                 _assign(begin, end); 
09200         } 
09201  
09202         XPathNodeSet::~XPathNodeSet() 
09203         { 
09204                 if (_begin != &_storage) global_deallocate(_begin); 
09205         } 
09206                  
09207         XPathNodeSet::XPathNodeSet(const XPathNodeSet& ns): _type(ns._type), _begin(&_storage), _end(&_storage) 
09208         { 
09209                 _assign(ns._begin, ns._end); 
09210         } 
09211          
09212         XPathNodeSet& XPathNodeSet::operator=(const XPathNodeSet& ns) 
09213         { 
09214                 if (this == &ns) return *this; 
09215                  
09216                 _type = ns._type; 
09217                 _assign(ns._begin, ns._end); 
09218  
09219                 return *this; 
09220         } 
09221  
09222         XPathNodeSet::CollectionType XPathNodeSet::Type() const 
09223         { 
09224                 return _type; 
09225         } 
09226                  
09227         size_t XPathNodeSet::size() const 
09228         { 
09229                 return _end - _begin; 
09230         } 
09231                  
09232         bool XPathNodeSet::Empty() const 
09233         { 
09234                 return _begin == _end; 
09235         } 
09236                  
09237         const XPathNode& XPathNodeSet::operator[](size_t index) const 
09238         { 
09239                 assert(index < size()); 
09240                 return _begin[index]; 
09241         } 
09242  
09243         XPathNodeSet::const_iterator XPathNodeSet::begin() const 
09244         { 
09245                 return _begin; 
09246         } 
09247                  
09248         XPathNodeSet::const_iterator XPathNodeSet::end() const 
09249         { 
09250                 return _end; 
09251         } 
09252          
09253         void XPathNodeSet::sort(bool reverse) 
09254         { 
09255                 _type = XPathSort(_begin, _end, _type, reverse); 
09256         } 
09257  
09258         XPathNode XPathNodeSet::first() const 
09259         { 
09260                 return XPathFirst(_begin, _end, _type); 
09261         } 
09262  
09263         XPathParseResult::XPathParseResult(): error("Internal error"), Offset(0) 
09264         { 
09265         } 
09266  
09267         XPathParseResult::operator bool() const 
09268         { 
09269                 return error == 0; 
09270         } 
09271         const char* XPathParseResult::Description() const 
09272         { 
09273                 return error ? error : "No error"; 
09274         } 
09275  
09276         XPathVariable::XPathVariable() 
09277         { 
09278         } 
09279  
09280         const char_t* XPathVariable::Name() const 
09281         { 
09282                 switch (_type) 
09283                 { 
09284                 case XPathTypeNodeSet: 
09285                         return static_cast<const XPathVariableNodeSet*>(this)->Name; 
09286  
09287                 case XPathTypeNumber: 
09288                         return static_cast<const XPathVariableNumber*>(this)->Name; 
09289  
09290                 case XPathTypeString: 
09291                         return static_cast<const XPathVariableString*>(this)->Name; 
09292  
09293                 case XPathTypeBoolean: 
09294                         return static_cast<const XPathVariableBoolean*>(this)->Name; 
09295  
09296                 default: 
09297                         assert(!"Invalid variable Type"); 
09298                         return 0; 
09299                 } 
09300         } 
09301  
09302         XPathValueType XPathVariable::Type() const 
09303         { 
09304                 return _type; 
09305         } 
09306  
09307         bool XPathVariable::GetBoolean() const 
09308         { 
09309                 return (_type == XPathTypeBoolean) ? static_cast<const XPathVariableBoolean*>(this)->Value : false; 
09310         } 
09311  
09312         double XPathVariable::GetNumber() const 
09313         { 
09314                 return (_type == XPathTypeNumber) ? static_cast<const XPathVariableNumber*>(this)->Value : gen_nan(); 
09315         } 
09316  
09317         const char_t* XPathVariable::GetString() const 
09318         { 
09319                 const char_t* Value = (_type == XPathTypeString) ? static_cast<const XPathVariableString*>(this)->Value : 0; 
09320                 return Value ? Value : XML_TEXT(""); 
09321         } 
09322  
09323         const XPathNodeSet& XPathVariable::GetNodeSet() const 
09324         { 
09325                 return (_type == XPathTypeNodeSet) ? static_cast<const XPathVariableNodeSet*>(this)->Value : dummy_NodeSet; 
09326         } 
09327  
09328         bool XPathVariable::Set(bool Value) 
09329         { 
09330                 if (_type != XPathTypeBoolean) return false; 
09331  
09332                 static_cast<XPathVariableBoolean*>(this)->Value = Value; 
09333                 return true; 
09334         } 
09335  
09336         bool XPathVariable::Set(double Value) 
09337         { 
09338                 if (_type != XPathTypeNumber) return false; 
09339  
09340                 static_cast<XPathVariableNumber*>(this)->Value = Value; 
09341                 return true; 
09342         } 
09343  
09344         bool XPathVariable::Set(const char_t* Value) 
09345         { 
09346                 if (_type != XPathTypeString) return false; 
09347  
09348                 XPathVariableString* var = static_cast<XPathVariableString*>(this); 
09349  
09350                 // duplicate string 
09351                 size_t size = (strlength(Value) + 1) * sizeof(char_t); 
09352  
09353                 char_t* copy = static_cast<char_t*>(global_allocate(size)); 
09354                 if (!copy) return false; 
09355  
09356                 memcpy(copy, Value, size); 
09357  
09358                 // replace old string 
09359                 if (var->Value) global_deallocate(var->Value); 
09360                 var->Value = copy; 
09361  
09362                 return true; 
09363         } 
09364  
09365         bool XPathVariable::Set(const XPathNodeSet& Value) 
09366         { 
09367                 if (_type != XPathTypeNodeSet) return false; 
09368  
09369                 static_cast<XPathVariableNodeSet*>(this)->Value = Value; 
09370                 return true; 
09371         } 
09372  
09373         XPathVariableSet::XPathVariableSet() 
09374         { 
09375                 for (size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(_data) / sizeof(_data[0]); ++i) _data[i] = 0; 
09376         } 
09377  
09378         XPathVariableSet::~XPathVariableSet() 
09379         { 
09380                 for (size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(_data) / sizeof(_data[0]); ++i) 
09381                 { 
09382                         XPathVariable* var = _data[i]; 
09383  
09384                         while (var) 
09385                         { 
09386                                 XPathVariable* next = var->_next; 
09387  
09388                                 delete_XPathVariable(var->_type, var); 
09389  
09390                                 var = next; 
09391                         } 
09392                 } 
09393         } 
09394  
09395         XPathVariable* XPathVariableSet::find(const char_t* Name) const 
09396         { 
09397                 const size_t hash_size = sizeof(_data) / sizeof(_data[0]); 
09398                 size_t hash = hash_string(Name) % hash_size; 
09399  
09400                 // look for existing variable 
09401                 for (XPathVariable* var = _data[hash]; var; var = var->_next) 
09402                         if (strequal(var->Name(), Name)) 
09403                                 return var; 
09404  
09405                 return 0; 
09406         } 
09407  
09408         XPathVariable* XPathVariableSet::Add(const char_t* Name, XPathValueType Type) 
09409         { 
09410                 const size_t hash_size = sizeof(_data) / sizeof(_data[0]); 
09411                 size_t hash = hash_string(Name) % hash_size; 
09412  
09413                 // look for existing variable 
09414                 for (XPathVariable* var = _data[hash]; var; var = var->_next) 
09415                         if (strequal(var->Name(), Name)) 
09416                                 return var->Type() == Type ? var : 0; 
09417  
09418                 // add new variable 
09419                 XPathVariable* Result = new_XPathVariable(Type, Name); 
09420  
09421                 if (Result) 
09422                 { 
09423                         Result->_type = Type; 
09424                         Result->_next = _data[hash]; 
09425  
09426                         _data[hash] = Result; 
09427                 } 
09428  
09429                 return Result; 
09430         } 
09431  
09432         bool XPathVariableSet::Set(const char_t* Name, bool Value) 
09433         { 
09434                 XPathVariable* var = Add(Name, XPathTypeBoolean); 
09435                 return var ? var->Set(Value) : false; 
09436         } 
09437  
09438         bool XPathVariableSet::Set(const char_t* Name, double Value) 
09439         { 
09440                 XPathVariable* var = Add(Name, XPathTypeNumber); 
09441                 return var ? var->Set(Value) : false; 
09442         } 
09443  
09444         bool XPathVariableSet::Set(const char_t* Name, const char_t* Value) 
09445         { 
09446                 XPathVariable* var = Add(Name, XPathTypeString); 
09447                 return var ? var->Set(Value) : false; 
09448         } 
09449  
09450         bool XPathVariableSet::Set(const char_t* Name, const XPathNodeSet& Value) 
09451         { 
09452                 XPathVariable* var = Add(Name, XPathTypeNodeSet); 
09453                 return var ? var->Set(Value) : false; 
09454         } 
09455  
09456         XPathVariable* XPathVariableSet::Get(const char_t* Name) 
09457         { 
09458                 return find(Name); 
09459         } 
09460  
09461         const XPathVariable* XPathVariableSet::Get(const char_t* Name) const 
09462         { 
09463                 return find(Name); 
09464         } 
09465  
09466         XPathQuery::XPathQuery(const char_t* query, XPathVariableSet* variables): _impl(0) 
09467         { 
09468                 XPathQueryImpl* impl = XPathQueryImpl::create(); 
09469  
09470                 if (!impl) 
09471                 { 
09472                 #ifdef XML_NO_EXCEPTIONS 
09473                         _Result.error = "Out of memory"; 
09474                 #else 
09475                         throw std::bad_alloc(); 
09476                 #endif 
09477                 } 
09478                 else 
09479                 { 
09480                         buffer_holder impl_holder(impl, XPathQueryImpl::destroy); 
09481  
09482                         impl->GetRoot = XPathParser::parse(query, variables, &impl->alloc, &_Result); 
09483  
09484                         if (impl->GetRoot) 
09485                         { 
09486                                 _impl = static_cast<XPathQueryImpl*>(impl_holder.release()); 
09487                                 _Result.error = 0; 
09488                         } 
09489                 } 
09490         } 
09491  
09492         XPathQuery::~XPathQuery() 
09493         { 
09494                 XPathQueryImpl::destroy(_impl); 
09495         } 
09496  
09497         XPathValueType XPathQuery::ReturnType() const 
09498         { 
09499                 if (!_impl) return XPathTypeNone; 
09500  
09501                 return static_cast<XPathQueryImpl*>(_impl)->GetRoot->retType(); 
09502         } 
09503  
09504         bool XPathQuery::EvaluateBoolean(const XPathNode& n) const 
09505         { 
09506                 if (!_impl) return false; 
09507                  
09508                 XPathContext c(n, 1, 1); 
09509                 XPathStackData sd; 
09510  
09511         #ifdef XML_NO_EXCEPTIONS 
09512                 if (setjmp(sd.error_handler)) return false; 
09513         #endif 
09514                  
09515                 return static_cast<XPathQueryImpl*>(_impl)->GetRoot->eval_boolean(c, sd.stack); 
09516         } 
09517          
09518         double XPathQuery::EvaluateNumber(const XPathNode& n) const 
09519         { 
09520                 if (!_impl) return gen_nan(); 
09521                  
09522                 XPathContext c(n, 1, 1); 
09523                 XPathStackData sd; 
09524  
09525         #ifdef XML_NO_EXCEPTIONS 
09526                 if (setjmp(sd.error_handler)) return gen_nan(); 
09527         #endif 
09528  
09529                 return static_cast<XPathQueryImpl*>(_impl)->GetRoot->eval_number(c, sd.stack); 
09530         } 
09531  
09532 #ifndef XML_NO_STL 
09533         String XPathQuery::EvaluateString(const XPathNode& n) const 
09534         { 
09535                 XPathStackData sd; 
09536  
09537                 return EvaluateString_impl(static_cast<XPathQueryImpl*>(_impl), n, sd).c_str(); 
09538         } 
09539 #endif 
09540  
09541         size_t XPathQuery::EvaluateString(char_t* buffer, size_t capacity, const XPathNode& n) const 
09542         { 
09543                 XPathStackData sd; 
09544  
09545                 XPathString r = EvaluateString_impl(static_cast<XPathQueryImpl*>(_impl), n, sd); 
09546  
09547                 size_t full_size = r.length() + 1; 
09548                  
09549                 if (capacity > 0) 
09550                 { 
09551                         size_t size = (full_size < capacity) ? full_size : capacity; 
09552                         assert(size > 0); 
09553  
09554                         memcpy(buffer, r.c_str(), (size - 1) * sizeof(char_t)); 
09555                         buffer[size - 1] = 0; 
09556                 } 
09557                  
09558                 return full_size; 
09559         } 
09560  
09561         XPathNodeSet XPathQuery::EvaluateNodeSet(const XPathNode& n) const 
09562         { 
09563                 if (!_impl) return XPathNodeSet(); 
09564  
09565                 XPathAstNode* GetRoot = static_cast<XPathQueryImpl*>(_impl)->GetRoot; 
09566  
09567                 if (GetRoot->retType() != XPathTypeNodeSet) 
09568                 { 
09569                 #ifdef XML_NO_EXCEPTIONS 
09570                         return XPathNodeSet(); 
09571                 #else 
09572                         XPathParseResult Result; 
09573                         Result.error = "Expression does not evaluate to node set"; 
09574  
09575                         throw XPathException(Result); 
09576                 #endif 
09577                 } 
09578                  
09579                 XPathContext c(n, 1, 1); 
09580                 XPathStackData sd; 
09581  
09582         #ifdef XML_NO_EXCEPTIONS 
09583                 if (setjmp(sd.error_handler)) return XPathNodeSet(); 
09584         #endif 
09585  
09586                 XPathNodeSet_raw r = GetRoot->eval_NodeSet(c, sd.stack); 
09587  
09588                 return XPathNodeSet(r.begin(), r.end(), r.Type()); 
09589         } 
09590  
09591         const XPathParseResult& XPathQuery::Result() const 
09592         { 
09593                 return _Result; 
09594         } 
09595  
09596         XPathQuery::operator XPathQuery::unspecified_bool_type() const 
09597         { 
09598                 return _impl ? &XPathQuery::_impl : 0; 
09599         } 
09600  
09601         bool XPathQuery::operator!() const 
09602         { 
09603                 return !_impl; 
09604         } 
09605  
09606         XPathNode Node::FindSingleNode(const char_t* query, XPathVariableSet* variables) const 
09607         { 
09608                 XPathQuery q(query, variables); 
09609                 return FindSingleNode(q); 
09610         } 
09611  
09612         XPathNode Node::FindSingleNode(const XPathQuery& query) const 
09613         { 
09614                 XPathNodeSet s = query.EvaluateNodeSet(*this); 
09615                 return s.Empty() ? XPathNode() : s.first(); 
09616         } 
09617  
09618         XPathNodeSet Node::FindNodes(const char_t* query, XPathVariableSet* variables) const 
09619         { 
09620                 XPathQuery q(query, variables); 
09621                 return FindNodes(q); 
09622         } 
09623  
09624         XPathNodeSet Node::FindNodes(const XPathQuery& query) const 
09625         { 
09626                 return query.EvaluateNodeSet(*this); 
09627         } 
09628 } 
09629 } // \phys

09631 #endif
